title.en: Biographies of Zhang Er and Chen Yu
title.raw: 《張耳陳餘列傳》 Biographies of Zhang Er and Chen Yu

sentences.zh: 張耳者，大梁人也。

translations.literal: Zhang Er, his person Daliang person.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er was a native of Daliang.

sentences.zh: 其少時，及魏公子毋忌為客。

translations.literal: His youth time, with Wei crown prince Wu Ji as guest.
translations.idiomatic: In his youth, he served as a retainer to Prince Wu Ji of Wei.

sentences.zh: 張耳嘗亡命游外黃。

translations.literal: Zhang Er once fled life wandered Waihuang.
translations.idiomatic: Once, Zhang Er fled for his life and wandered to Waihuang.

sentences.zh: 外黃富人女甚美，嫁庸奴，亡其夫，去抵父客。

translations.literal: Waihuang rich person daughter very beautiful, married common slave, fled her husband, went returned father guest.
translations.idiomatic: The daughter of a wealthy man in Waihuang was very beautiful. She had been married to a common slave, fled from her husband, and returned to her father's guest.

sentences.zh: 父客素知張耳，乃謂女曰：「必欲求賢夫，從張耳。」

translations.literal: Father guest originally knew Zhang Er, then told daughter: 'Certainly wish seek worthy husband, follow Zhang Er.'
translations.idiomatic: Her father's guest had long known Zhang Er, and he told the daughter: 'If you truly wish to find a worthy husband, marry Zhang Er.'

sentences.zh: 女聽，乃卒為請決，嫁之張耳。

translations.literal: Daughter listened, then finally for him plead decision, married Zhang Er.
translations.idiomatic: The daughter listened to this advice, and in the end she pleaded with her father and was married to Zhang Er.

sentences.zh: 張耳是時脫身游，女家厚奉給張耳，張耳以故致千里客。

translations.literal: Zhang Er at time escaped body wandered, daughter family thick provided gave Zhang Er, Zhang Er because this attracted thousand li guests.
translations.idiomatic: At this time Zhang Er was wandering as a fugitive. Her family provided generously for Zhang Er, and because of this he attracted retainers from a thousand li away.

sentences.zh: 乃宦魏為外黃令。

translations.literal: Then served Wei as Waihuang magistrate.
translations.idiomatic: He then served Wei as magistrate of Waihuang.

sentences.zh: 名由此益賢。

translations.literal: Name by this increasingly worthy.
translations.idiomatic: His reputation for worthiness grew from this.

sentences.zh: 陳餘者，亦大梁人也，好儒術，數游趙苦陘。

translations.literal: Chen Yu, also Daliang person, loved Confucian arts, several times wandered Zhao Ku Xing.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu was also a native of Daliang. He loved the Confucian arts and frequently traveled to the Ku Xing district of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 富人公乘氏以其女妻之，亦知陳餘非庸人也。

translations.literal: Rich person Gongcheng clan with his daughter wife him, also knew Chen Yu not common person.
translations.idiomatic: A wealthy man of the Gongcheng clan gave his daughter in marriage to Chen Yu, recognizing that Chen Yu was no ordinary man.

sentences.zh: 餘年少，父事張耳，兩人相與為刎頸交。

translations.literal: Yu young, father treated Zhang Er, two persons mutually became neck-cutting friendship.
translations.idiomatic: Though young, Chen Yu treated Zhang Er as a father. The two men became sworn brothers willing to die for each other.

translations.literal: Zhang Er, his person Daliang person. His youth time, with Wei crown prince Wu Ji as guest. Zhang Er once fled life wandered Waihuang. Waihuang rich person daughter very beautiful, married common slave, fled her husband, went returned father guest. Father guest originally knew Zhang Er, then told daughter: 'Certainly wish seek worthy husband, follow Zhang Er.' Daughter listened, then finally for him plead decision, married Zhang Er. Zhang Er at time escaped body wandered, daughter family thick provided gave Zhang Er, Zhang Er because this attracted thousand li guests. Then served Wei as Waihuang magistrate. Name by this increasingly worthy. Chen Yu, also Daliang person, loved Confucian arts, several times wandered Zhao Ku Xing. Rich person Gongcheng clan with his daughter wife him, also knew Chen Yu not common person. Yu young, father treated Zhang Er, two persons mutually became neck-cutting friendship.

sentences.zh: 秦之滅大梁也，張耳家外黃。

translations.literal: Qin extinguished Daliang, Zhang Er family Waihuang.
translations.idiomatic: When Qin destroyed Daliang, Zhang Er's family was in Waihuang.

sentences.zh: 高祖為布衣時，嘗數從張耳游，客數月。

translations.literal: Gao Zu as commoner time, once several times followed Zhang Er wandered, guest several months.
translations.idiomatic: When Gao Zu was still a commoner, he once followed Zhang Er on his travels and stayed as his guest for several months.

sentences.zh: 秦滅魏數歲，已聞此兩人魏之名士也，購求有得張耳千金，陳餘五百金。

translations.literal: Qin extinguished Wei several years, already heard these two persons Wei name scholars, purchased sought got Zhang Er thousand gold, Chen Yu five hundred gold.
translations.idiomatic: Several years after Qin destroyed Wei, they had already heard that these two men were famous scholars of Wei. They offered a bounty: one thousand gold pieces for Zhang Er, five hundred for Chen Yu.

sentences.zh: 張耳、陳餘乃變名姓，俱之陳，為里監門以自食。

translations.literal: Zhang Er, Chen Yu then changed name surname, together went Chen, became village gatekeeper to self support.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er and Chen Yu then changed their names and went together to Chen, where they became village gatekeepers to support themselves.

sentences.zh: 兩人相對。

translations.literal: Two persons faced each other.
translations.idiomatic: The two men sat facing each other.

sentences.zh: 里吏嘗有過笞陳餘，陳餘欲起，張耳躡之，使受笞。

translations.literal: Village official once had error flogged Chen Yu, Chen Yu wished rise, Zhang Er stepped on him, made receive flog.
translations.idiomatic: Once a village official erred and flogged Chen Yu. Chen Yu wanted to rise up, but Zhang Er stepped on his foot, making him endure the flogging.

sentences.zh: 吏去，張耳乃引陳餘之桑下而數之曰：「始吾與公言何如？

translations.literal: Official gone, Zhang Er then led Chen Yu to mulberry below counted him: 'Beginning I with you speak what like?
translations.idiomatic: After the official left, Zhang Er led Chen Yu under the mulberry trees and reproached him: 'What did I tell you at the beginning?'

sentences.zh: 今見小辱而欲死一吏乎？」

translations.literal: Now see small humiliation wish die one official?'
translations.idiomatic: Now you see a small humiliation and want to die fighting one official?'

sentences.zh: 陳餘然之。

translations.literal: Chen Yu yes that.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu acknowledged this was so.

sentences.zh: 秦詔書購求兩人，兩人亦反用門者以令里中。

translations.literal: Qin decree book purchased sought two persons, two persons also instead used gatekeeper to command village middle.
translations.idiomatic: Qin had issued decrees with bounties for the two men. The two men turned this around and used their gatekeeper position to command the village.

translations.literal: Qin extinguished Daliang, Zhang Er family Waihuang. Gao Zu as commoner time, once several times followed Zhang Er wandered, guest several months. Qin extinguished Wei several years, already heard these two persons Wei name scholars, purchased sought got Zhang Er thousand gold, Chen Yu five hundred gold. Zhang Er, Chen Yu then changed name surname, together went Chen, became village gatekeeper to self support. Two persons faced each other. Village official once had error flogged Chen Yu, Chen Yu wished rise, Zhang Er stepped on him, made receive flog. Official gone, Zhang Er then led Chen Yu to mulberry below counted him: 'Beginning I with you speak what like? Now see small humiliation wish die one official?' Chen Yu yes that. Qin decree book purchased sought two persons, two persons also instead used gatekeeper to command village middle.

sentences.zh: 陳涉起蘄，至入陳，兵數萬。

translations.literal: Chen She rose Qi, arrived entered Chen, troops several ten thousand.
translations.idiomatic: Chen She rose in rebellion at Qi, arrived and entered Chen, with tens of thousands of troops.

sentences.zh: 張耳、陳餘上謁陳涉。

translations.literal: Zhang Er, Chen Yu up met Chen She.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er and Chen Yu went to pay their respects to Chen She.

sentences.zh: 涉及左右生平數聞張耳、陳餘賢，未嘗見，見即大喜。

translations.literal: She involved left right lifetime several heard Zhang Er, Chen Yu worthy, not tasted see, see then greatly happy.
translations.idiomatic: Chen She and his attendants had heard of Zhang Er and Chen Yu's worthiness many times in their lives but had never seen them. When they did, Chen She was greatly delighted.

translations.literal: Chen She rose Qi, arrived entered Chen, troops several ten thousand. Zhang Er, Chen Yu up met Chen She. She involved left right lifetime several heard Zhang Er, Chen Yu worthy, not tasted see, see then greatly happy.

sentences.zh: 陳中豪傑父老乃說陳涉曰：「將軍身被堅執銳，率士卒以誅暴秦，復立楚社稷，存亡繼絕，功德宜為王。

translations.literal: Chen middle heroes elders then persuaded Chen She: 'General body wore armor grasped sharp weapons, led soldiers to execute violent Qin, restored established Chu altars of soil, preserved perished continued severed, merit virtue should become king.
translations.idiomatic: The heroes and elders of Chen then persuaded Chen She: 'General, you don armor and grasp sharp weapons, leading soldiers to execute the violent Qin, restoring and establishing the Chu altars of soil and grain, preserving the perished and continuing the severed—your merit and virtue make you worthy to be king.'

sentences.zh: 且夫監臨天下諸將，不為王不可，願將軍立為楚王也。」

translations.literal: Moreover monitor oversee world various generals, not become king cannot, wish general establish as Chu king.'
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, to oversee the world's various generals without being king is impossible. We wish you, General, to establish yourself as King of Chu.'

sentences.zh: 陳涉問此兩人，兩人對曰：「夫秦為無道，破人國家，滅人社稷，絕人後世，罷百姓之力，盡百姓之財。

translations.literal: Chen She asked these two persons, two persons replied: 'Chu for no way, broke person states, extinguished person altars of soil, severed person posterity, exhausted hundred surnames strength, used up hundred surnames wealth.
translations.idiomatic: Chen She asked these two men, and they replied: 'Qin acts without the Way, destroying people's states, extinguishing people's altars of soil and grain, severing people's posterity, exhausting the people's strength, and using up the people's wealth.'

sentences.zh: 將軍瞋目張膽，出萬死不顧一生之計，為天下除殘也。

translations.literal: General glared eyes stretched courage, out ten thousand deaths not regard one life plan, for world remove cruelty.
translations.idiomatic: General, you glare with anger and stretch your courage, venturing into certain death without regard for preserving your life, all to remove cruelty from the world.'

sentences.zh: 今始至陳而王之，示天下私。

translations.literal: Now beginning arrived Chen then king it, show world private.
translations.idiomatic: Now you have just arrived in Chen and would make yourself king—this shows partiality to the world.'

sentences.zh: 願將軍毋王，急引兵而西，遣人立六國後，自為樹黨，為秦益敵也。

translations.literal: Wish general no king, urgent led troops west, sent people establish six states posterity, self for tree party, for Qin increase enemy.
translations.idiomatic: We wish you, General, not to become king yet. Urgently lead your troops west, send people to establish descendants of the six states as rulers, build your own alliances—for Qin this will increase the number of enemies.'

sentences.zh: 敵多則力分，與眾則兵彊。

translations.literal: Enemy many then strength divide, with masses then troops strong.
translations.idiomatic: With many enemies, their strength will be divided; allied with the masses, your troops will be strong.'

sentences.zh: 如此野無交兵，縣無守城，誅暴秦，據咸陽以令諸侯。

translations.literal: Like this wilderness no intersect battle, county no guard city, execute violent Qin, occupy Xianyang to command feudal lords.
translations.idiomatic: In this way, there will be no battles in the wilderness, no defended cities in the counties; execute the violent Qin, occupy Xianyang, and command the feudal lords from there.'

sentences.zh: 諸侯亡而得立，以德服之，如此則帝業成矣。

translations.literal: Feudal lords perished then got establish, with virtue subdue them, like this then imperial enterprise complete.
translations.idiomatic: The feudal lords who perished will be reestablished, and you will subdue them with virtue. In this way, the imperial enterprise will be completed.'

sentences.zh: 今獨王陳，恐天下解也。」

translations.literal: Now alone king Chen, fear world dissolve.'
translations.idiomatic: Now if you alone become king in Chen, we fear the world will lose heart.'

sentences.zh: 陳涉不聽，遂立為王。

translations.literal: Chen She not listened, then established as king.
translations.idiomatic: Chen She did not listen and was established as king.

translations.literal: Chen middle heroes elders then persuaded Chen She: 'General body wore armor grasped sharp weapons, led soldiers to execute violent Qin, restored established Chu altars of soil, preserved perished continued severed, merit virtue should become king. Moreover monitor oversee world various generals, not become king cannot, wish general establish as Chu king.' Chen She asked these two persons, two persons replied: 'Chu for no way, broke person states, extinguished person altars of soil, severed person posterity, exhausted hundred surnames strength, used up hundred surnames wealth. General glared eyes stretched courage, out ten thousand deaths not regard one life plan, for world remove cruelty. Now beginning arrived Chen then king it, show world private. Wish general no king, urgent led troops west, sent people establish six states posterity, self for tree party, for Qin increase enemy. Enemy many then strength divide, with masses then troops strong. Like this wilderness no intersect battle, county no guard city, execute violent Qin, occupy Xianyang to command feudal lords. Feudal lords perished then got establish, with virtue subdue them, like this then imperial enterprise complete. Now alone king Chen, fear world dissolve.' Chen She not listened, then established as king.

sentences.zh: 陳餘乃復說陳王曰：「大王舉梁、楚而西，務在入關，未及收河北也。

translations.literal: Chen Yu then again persuaded Chen king: 'Great king raised Liang, Chu west, focused in enter pass, not reached collect Hebei.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu then again persuaded the King of Chen: 'Your Majesty has raised Liang and Chu and gone west, focusing on entering the pass, but has not yet collected the lands north of the Yellow River.'

sentences.zh: 臣嘗游趙，知其豪桀及地形，願請奇兵北略趙地。」

translations.literal: Minister once wandered Zhao, knew its heroes terrain, wish ask odd troops north attack Zhao land.'
translations.idiomatic: Your servant once traveled in Zhao and knows its heroes and terrain. I wish to request elite troops to attack and seize Zhao territory to the north.'

sentences.zh: 於是陳王以故所善陳人武臣為將軍，邵騷為護軍，以張耳、陳餘為左右校尉，予卒三千人，北略趙地。

translations.literal: Then Chen king with formerly good Chen person Wu Chen as general, Shao Sao as protect army, with Zhang Er, Chen Yu as left right colonel, gave troops three thousand, north attack Zhao land.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Chen then appointed Wu Chen, a man from Chen he had long favored, as general, Shao Sao as Protector General, and Zhang Er and Chen Yu as Left and Right Colonels. He gave them three thousand troops to attack and seize Zhao territory to the north.

translations.literal: Chen Yu then again persuaded Chen king: 'Great king raised Liang, Chu west, focused in enter pass, not reached collect Hebei. Minister once wandered Zhao, knew its heroes terrain, wish ask odd troops north attack Zhao land.' Then Chen king with formerly good Chen person Wu Chen as general, Shao Sao as protect army, with Zhang Er, Chen Yu as left right colonel, gave troops three thousand, north attack Zhao land.

sentences.zh: 武臣等從白馬渡河，至諸縣，說其豪桀曰：「秦為亂政虐刑以殘賊天下，數十年矣。

translations.literal: Wu Chen etc. from Baima crossed river, to various counties, persuaded their heroes: 'Qin for chaotic government cruel punishments to harm world, several ten years.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Chen and his companions crossed the Yellow River at Baima and went to the various counties, where they persuaded the local heroes: 'Qin has had chaotic government and cruel punishments that have harmed the world for decades now.'

sentences.zh: 北有長城之役，南有五嶺之戍，外內騷動，百姓罷敝，頭會箕斂，以供軍費，財匱力盡，民不聊生。

translations.literal: North has long wall labor, south has five ridges garrison, outside inside disturbed, hundred surnames exhausted worn, head meeting basket collection, to supply army expenses, wealth depleted strength exhausted, people not live.
translations.idiomatic: To the north there are the Great Wall labors, to the south the Five Ridges garrisons; inside and outside are in turmoil, the people are exhausted and impoverished, taxed by the head and gathered in baskets to supply military expenses—wealth is depleted, strength exhausted, the people cannot survive.'

sentences.zh: 重之以苛法峻刑，使天下父子不相安。

translations.literal: Heavy with harsh laws severe punishments, made world fathers sons not peaceful.
translations.idiomatic: On top of this, harsh laws and severe punishments have made fathers and sons throughout the world unable to live in peace.'

sentences.zh: 陳王奮臂為天下倡始，王楚之地，方二千里，莫不響應，家自為怒，人自為鬬，各報其怨而攻其讎，縣殺其令丞，郡殺其守尉。

translations.literal: Chen king waved arm for world pioneer, occupied Chu land, square two thousand li, none not respond, family self anger, person self fight, each report their resentment attack their enemies, county kill their magistrate assistant, commandery kill their guard captain.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Chen waved his arm and pioneered the uprising for all under heaven. He rules the lands of Chu, spanning two thousand square li, and none fail to respond—families are angry on their own behalf, individuals fight for themselves, each avenging their resentments by attacking their enemies, counties killing their magistrates and assistants, commanderies killing their governors and captains.'

sentences.zh: 今已張大楚，王陳，使吳廣、周文將卒百萬西擊秦。

translations.literal: Now already spread great Chu, king Chen, made Wu Guang, Zhou Wen lead troops hundred thousand west attack Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Now Chu has been greatly expanded, and he rules as king in Chen, sending Wu Guang and Zhou Wen to lead a hundred thousand troops west to attack Qin.'

sentences.zh: 於此時而不成封侯之業者，非人豪也。

translations.literal: At this time not become seal marquis achievers, not person hero.
translations.idiomatic: At this time, those who do not achieve the status of enfeoffed marquises are not true heroes among men.'

sentences.zh: 諸君試相與計之！

translations.literal: Various lords try mutually plan it!
translations.idiomatic: All of you gentlemen, try to plan this together!'

sentences.zh: 夫天下同心而苦秦久矣。

translations.literal: World same heart suffered Qin long.
translations.idiomatic: Indeed, the world has long been united in suffering under Qin.'

sentences.zh: 因天下之力而攻無道之君，報父兄之怨而成割地有土之業，此士之一時也。」

translations.literal: Because world strength attack no way lord, report fathers brothers resentment become divide land have soil enterprise, this scholar one time.'
translations.idiomatic: Relying on the strength of the world to attack a lord without the Way, avenging the resentments of fathers and brothers, and achieving the enterprise of dividing land and possessing territory—this is the time for scholars!'

sentences.zh: 豪桀皆然其言。

translations.literal: Heroes all yes their words.
translations.idiomatic: All the heroes agreed with their words.

sentences.zh: 乃行收兵，得數萬人，號武臣為武信君。

translations.literal: Then went collect troops, got several ten thousand persons, titled Wu Chen as Wu Xin Jun.
translations.idiomatic: They then went about gathering troops and obtained tens of thousands of men, giving Wu Chen the title Lord of Martial Trust.

sentences.zh: 下趙十城，餘皆城守，莫肯下。

translations.literal: Down Zhao ten cities, remainder all walled guarded, none willing down.
translations.idiomatic: They took ten cities in Zhao, but the rest all defended their walls and refused to surrender.

translations.literal: Wu Chen etc. from Baima crossed river, to various counties, persuaded their heroes: 'Qin for chaotic government cruel punishments to harm world, several ten years. North has long wall labor, south has five ridges garrison, outside inside disturbed, hundred surnames exhausted worn, head meeting basket collection, to supply army expenses, wealth depleted strength exhausted, people not live. Heavy with harsh laws severe punishments, made world fathers sons not peaceful. Chen king waved arm for world pioneer, occupied Chu land, square two thousand li, none not respond, family self anger, person self fight, each report their resentment attack their enemies, county kill their magistrate assistant, commandery kill their guard captain. Now already spread great Chu, king Chen, made Wu Guang, Zhou Wen lead troops hundred thousand west attack Qin. At this time not become seal marquis achievers, not person hero. Various lords try mutually plan it! World same heart suffered Qin long. Because world strength attack no way lord, report fathers brothers resentment become divide land have soil enterprise, this scholar one time.' Heroes all yes their words. Then went collect troops, got several ten thousand persons, titled Wu Chen as Wu Xin Jun. Down Zhao ten cities, remainder all walled guarded, none willing down.

sentences.zh: 乃引兵東北擊范陽。

translations.literal: Then led troops northeast attacked Fanyang.
translations.idiomatic: They then led their troops northeast to attack Fanyang.

sentences.zh: 范陽人蒯通說范陽令曰：「竊聞公之將死，故弔。

translations.literal: Fanyang person Kuai Tong persuaded Fanyang magistrate: 'Secretly heard lord will die, thus condole.
translations.idiomatic: Kuai Tong, a man from Fanyang, persuaded the magistrate of Fanyang: 'I have secretly heard that you are about to die, so I have come to offer my condolences.'

sentences.zh: 雖然，賀公得通而生。」

translations.literal: Although so, congratulate lord got Tong live.'
translations.idiomatic: However, I congratulate you, my lord, that meeting me means you will live.'

sentences.zh: 范陽令曰：「何以弔之？」

translations.literal: Fanyang magistrate said: 'With what condole it?'
translations.idiomatic: The magistrate of Fanyang said: 'How are you offering condolences?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「秦法重，足下為范陽令十年矣，殺人之父，孤人之子，斷人之足，黥人之首，不可勝數。

translations.literal: Replied: 'Qin law heavy, your excellency as Fanyang magistrate ten years, killed person father, orphaned person son, broke person feet, tattooed person head, cannot count.
translations.idiomatic: He replied: 'Qin's laws are harsh. Your Excellency has been magistrate of Fanyang for ten years now, killing people's fathers, orphaning people's sons, breaking people's feet, tattooing people's heads—too numerous to count.'

sentences.zh: 然而慈父孝子莫敢倳刃公之腹中者，畏秦法耳。

translations.literal: However kind fathers filial sons none dare stab blade lord abdomen middle, feared Qin law only.
translations.idiomatic: However, compassionate fathers and filial sons dared not stab blades into your abdomen only because they feared Qin's laws.'

sentences.zh: 今天下大亂，秦法不施，然則慈父孝子且倳刃公之腹中以成其名，此臣之所以弔公也。

translations.literal: Now world greatly chaotic, Qin law not applied, then kind fathers filial sons moreover stab blade lord abdomen middle to complete their name, this minister what condole lord.'
translations.idiomatic: Now the world is in great chaos and Qin's laws are not enforced. Thus compassionate fathers and filial sons will soon stab blades into your abdomen to achieve their reputations. This is why I offer you my condolences.'

sentences.zh: 今諸侯畔秦矣，武信君兵且至，而君堅守范陽，少年皆爭殺君，下武信君。

translations.literal: Now feudal lords rebelled Qin, Wu Xin Jun troops moreover arrived, yet lord firmly guard Fanyang, youths all contend kill lord, down Wu Xin Jun.
translations.idiomatic: Now the feudal lords have rebelled against Qin, and Lord Wu Xin's troops are about to arrive. Yet you firmly defend Fanyang—the young men will all contend to kill you and surrender to Lord Wu Xin.'

sentences.zh: 君急遣臣見武信君，可轉禍為福，在今矣。」

translations.literal: Lord urgent send minister see Wu Xin Jun, can turn calamity to fortune, at now.'
translations.idiomatic: You must urgently send me to see Lord Wu Xin. I can turn this calamity into fortune—it depends on this moment.'

translations.literal: Then led troops northeast attacked Fanyang. Fanyang person Kuai Tong persuaded Fanyang magistrate: 'Secretly heard lord will die, thus condole. Although so, congratulate lord got Tong live.' Fanyang magistrate said: 'With what condole it?' Replied: 'Qin law heavy, your excellency as Fanyang magistrate ten years, killed person father, orphaned person son, broke person feet, tattooed person head, cannot count. However kind fathers filial sons none dare stab blade lord abdomen middle, feared Qin law only. Now world greatly chaotic, Qin law not applied, then kind fathers filial sons moreover stab blade lord abdomen middle to complete their name, this minister what condole lord.' Now feudal lords rebelled Qin, Wu Xin Jun troops moreover arrived, yet lord firmly guard Fanyang, youths all contend kill lord, down Wu Xin Jun. Lord urgent send minister see Wu Xin Jun, can turn calamity to fortune, at now.'

sentences.zh: 范陽令乃使蒯通見武信君曰：「足下必將戰勝然後略地，攻得然後下城，臣竊以為過矣。

translations.literal: Fanyang magistrate then made Kuai Tong see Wu Xin Jun: 'Your excellency certainly will battle victory then attack land, attack get then down city, minister secretly considers over.
translations.idiomatic: The magistrate of Fanyang then sent Kuai Tong to see Lord Wu Xin: 'Your Excellency will certainly need to win battles before seizing territory, and capture cities after attacking them. Your servant privately considers this a mistake.'

sentences.zh: 誠聽臣之計，可不攻而降城，不戰而略地，傳檄而千里定，可乎？」

translations.literal: Truly listen minister plan, can not attack down city, not battle attack land, transmit notice then thousand li settle, possible?'
translations.idiomatic: If you truly listen to your servant's plan, you can make cities surrender without attacking, seize territory without battle, and pacify a thousand li by sending dispatches alone. Is this possible?'

sentences.zh: 武信君曰：「何謂也？」

translations.literal: Wu Xin Jun said: 'What call?'
translations.idiomatic: Lord Wu Xin said: 'What do you mean?'

sentences.zh: 蒯通曰：「今范陽令宜整頓其士卒以守戰者也，怯而畏死，貪而重富貴，故欲先天下降，畏君以為秦所置吏，誅殺如前十城也。

translations.literal: Kuai Tong said: 'Now Fanyang magistrate should arrange his soldiers guard battle, cowardly fear death, greedy heavy rich noble, thus wish first heaven down surrender, fear lord as Qin placed official, execute kill like previous ten cities.
translations.idiomatic: Kuai Tong said: 'The magistrate of Fanyang should be organizing his troops to defend and fight, but he is cowardly and fears death, greedy and values wealth and nobility. Thus he wishes to surrender first to gain favor with Heaven. He fears you will treat him as a Qin-appointed official and execute him like the magistrates of the previous ten cities.'

sentences.zh: 然今范陽少年亦方殺其令，自以城距君。

translations.literal: However now Fanyang youths also just kill their magistrate, self with city resist lord.
translations.idiomatic: However, the young men of Fanyang are also about to kill their magistrate and defend the city against you.'

sentences.zh: 君何不齎臣侯印，拜范陽令，范陽令則以城下君，少年亦不敢殺其令。

translations.literal: Lord why not carry minister marquis seal, appoint Fanyang magistrate, Fanyang magistrate then with city down lord, youths also dare not kill their magistrate.
translations.idiomatic: Why don't you give me a marquis seal and appoint the magistrate of Fanyang as a marquis? The magistrate will then surrender the city to you, and the young men will not dare kill their magistrate.'

sentences.zh: 令范陽令乘朱輪華轂，使驅馳燕、趙郊。

translations.literal: Make Fanyang magistrate ride red wheel splendid carriage, make drive gallop Yan, Zhao suburbs.
translations.idiomatic: Have the magistrate of Fanyang ride in a red-wheeled, splendid carriage, and send him galloping through the suburbs of Yan and Zhao.'

sentences.zh: 燕、趙郊見之，皆曰此范陽令，先下者也，即喜矣，燕、趙城可毋戰而降也。

translations.literal: Yan, Zhao suburbs see it, all say this Fanyang magistrate, first down one, then happy, Yan, Zhao cities can no battle down.'
translations.idiomatic: When the suburbs of Yan and Zhao see him, they will all say: 'This is the magistrate of Fanyang, the first to surrender.' They will be delighted, and the cities of Yan and Zhao can surrender without battle.'

sentences.zh: 此臣之所謂傳檄而千里定者也。」

translations.literal: This minister what called transmit notice thousand li settle.'
translations.idiomatic: This is what your servant means by pacifying a thousand li through dispatches alone.'

sentences.zh: 武信君從其計，因使蒯通賜范陽令侯印。

translations.literal: Wu Xin Jun from his plan, because made Kuai Tong grant Fanyang magistrate marquis seal.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Wu Xin followed his plan and sent Kuai Tong to grant the magistrate of Fanyang a marquis seal.

sentences.zh: 趙地聞之，不戰以城下者三十餘城。

translations.literal: Zhao land heard it, not battle with city down thirty plus cities.
translations.idiomatic: When Zhao heard of this, more than thirty cities surrendered without battle.

translations.literal: Fanyang magistrate then made Kuai Tong see Wu Xin Jun: 'Your excellency certainly will battle victory then attack land, attack get then down city, minister secretly considers over. Truly listen minister plan, can not attack down city, not battle attack land, transmit notice then thousand li settle, possible?' Wu Xin Jun said: 'What call?' Kuai Tong said: 'Now Fanyang magistrate should arrange his soldiers guard battle, cowardly fear death, greedy heavy rich noble, thus wish first heaven down surrender, fear lord as Qin placed official, execute kill like previous ten cities. However now Fanyang youths also just kill their magistrate, self with city resist lord. Lord why not carry minister marquis seal, appoint Fanyang magistrate, Fanyang magistrate then with city down lord, youths also dare not kill their magistrate. Make Fanyang magistrate ride red wheel splendid carriage, make drive gallop Yan, Zhao suburbs. Yan, Zhao suburbs see it, all say this Fanyang magistrate, first down one, then happy, Yan, Zhao cities can no battle down.' This minister what called transmit notice thousand li settle.' Wu Xin Jun from his plan, because made Kuai Tong grant Fanyang magistrate marquis seal. Zhao land heard it, not battle with city down thirty plus cities.

sentences.zh: 至邯鄲，張耳、陳餘聞周章軍入關，至戲卻；

translations.literal: Arrived Handan, Zhang Er, Chen Yu heard Zhou Zhang army enter pass, to Xi retreated;
translations.idiomatic: Upon arriving in Handan, Zhang Er and Chen Yu heard that Zhou Zhang's army had entered the pass but retreated at Xi;

sentences.zh: 又聞諸將為陳王徇地，多以讒毀得罪誅，怨陳王不其筴不以為將而以為校尉。

translations.literal: Again heard various generals for Chen king attack land, many with slander destroyed got crime executed, resented Chen king not treat them not as general but as colonel.
translations.idiomatic: They also heard that various generals who had seized territory for the King of Chen were often slandered, found guilty, and executed. They resented the King of Chen for not treating them properly—not appointing them as generals but only as colonels.

sentences.zh: 乃說武臣曰：「陳王起蘄，至陳而王，非必立六國後。

translations.literal: Then persuaded Wu Chen: 'Chen king rose Qi, arrived Chen king, not necessarily establish six states posterity.
translations.idiomatic: They then persuaded Wu Chen: 'The King of Chen rose in Qi, reached Chen and became king, but he did not necessarily establish descendants of the six states.'

sentences.zh: 將軍今以三千人下趙數十城，獨介居河北，不王無以填之。

translations.literal: General now with three thousand down Zhao several ten cities, alone isolated dwell Hebei, not king no fill it.
translations.idiomatic: General, you have now taken tens of Zhao cities with three thousand men. You dwell isolated north of the Yellow River; if you do not become king, there is nothing to fill this void.'

sentences.zh: 且陳王聽讒，還報，恐不脫於禍。

translations.literal: Moreover Chen king listen slander, returned report, fear not escape calamity.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, the King of Chen listens to slanderers. If word gets back to him, we fear we cannot escape calamity.'

sentences.zh: 又不如立其兄弟；

translations.literal: Again not equal establish his brothers;
translations.idiomatic: It would be better to establish one of his brothers;

sentences.zh: 不，即立趙後。

translations.literal: Not, then establish Zhao posterity.
translations.idiomatic: If not, then establish a descendant of the Zhao royal family.

sentences.zh: 將軍毋失時，時閒不容息。」

translations.literal: General no lose time, time gap not allow rest.'
translations.idiomatic: General, do not miss this opportunity; there is no time to delay.'

sentences.zh: 武臣乃聽之，遂立為趙王。

translations.literal: Wu Chen then listened, then established as Zhao king.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Chen listened to them and was established as King of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 以陳餘為大將軍，張耳為右丞相，邵騷為左丞相。

translations.literal: With Chen Yu as great general, Zhang Er as right chancellor, Shao Sao as left chancellor.
translations.idiomatic: He appointed Chen Yu as Great General, Zhang Er as Right Chancellor, and Shao Sao as Left Chancellor.

translations.literal: Arrived Handan, Zhang Er, Chen Yu heard Zhou Zhang army enter pass, to Xi retreated; Again heard various generals for Chen king attack land, many with slander destroyed got crime executed, resented Chen king not treat them not as general but as colonel. Then persuaded Wu Chen: 'Chen king rose Qi, arrived Chen king, not necessarily establish six states posterity. General now with three thousand down Zhao several ten cities, alone isolated dwell Hebei, not king no fill it. Moreover Chen king listen slander, returned report, fear not escape calamity. Again not equal establish his brothers; Not, then establish Zhao posterity. General no lose time, time gap not allow rest.' Wu Chen then listened, then established as Zhao king. With Chen Yu as great general, Zhang Er as right chancellor, Shao Sao as left chancellor.

sentences.zh: 使人報陳王，陳王大怒，欲盡族武臣等家，而發兵擊趙。

translations.literal: Made people report Chen king, Chen king greatly angered, wished exterminate Wu Chen etc. family, yet send troops attack Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: Messengers reported this to the King of Chen, who became greatly enraged and wished to exterminate the families of Wu Chen and his followers, then send troops to attack Zhao.

sentences.zh: 陳王相國房君諫曰：「秦未亡而誅武臣等家，此又生一秦也。

translations.literal: Chen king chancellor Guo Jun advised: 'Qin not perished execute Wu Chen etc. family, this again give birth one Qin.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Chen's Chancellor, Lord Fang, advised: 'Qin has not yet perished, yet we execute the families of Wu Chen and his followers—this will give birth to another Qin.'

sentences.zh: 不如因而賀之，使急引兵西擊秦。」

translations.literal: Not equal because congratulate them, make urgent led troops west attack Qin.'
translations.idiomatic: It would be better to take advantage of this and congratulate them, making them urgently lead their troops west to attack Qin.'

sentences.zh: 陳王然之，從其計，徙系武臣等家宮中，封張耳子敖為成都君。

translations.literal: Chen king yes, from his plan, moved imprisoned Wu Chen etc. family palace middle, sealed Zhang Er son Ao as Chengdu jun.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Chen agreed and followed his plan. He moved the imprisoned families of Wu Chen and his followers into the palace and enfeoffed Zhang Er's son Ao as Lord of Chengdu.

translations.literal: Made people report Chen king, Chen king greatly angered, wished exterminate Wu Chen etc. family, yet send troops attack Zhao. Chen king chancellor Guo Jun advised: 'Qin not perished execute Wu Chen etc. family, this again give birth one Qin. Not equal because congratulate them, make urgent led troops west attack Qin.' Chen king yes, from his plan, moved imprisoned Wu Chen etc. family palace middle, sealed Zhang Er son Ao as Chengdu jun.

sentences.zh: 陳王使使者賀趙，令趣發兵西入關。

translations.literal: Chen king made envoy congratulate Zhao, commanded hasten send troops west enter pass.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Chen sent envoys to congratulate Zhao and commanded them to hasten and send troops west to enter the pass.

sentences.zh: 張耳、陳餘說武臣曰：「王王趙，非楚意，特以計賀王。

translations.literal: Zhang Er, Chen Yu persuaded Wu Chen: 'King king Zhao, not Chu intent, special with plan congratulate king.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er and Chen Yu persuaded Wu Chen: 'Your becoming King of Zhao was not Chu's intention; they specially congratulate you as a stratagem.'

sentences.zh: 楚已滅秦，必加兵於趙。

translations.literal: Chu already extinguished Qin, certainly add troops to Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: Once Chu has extinguished Qin, they will certainly turn their troops against Zhao.'

sentences.zh: 願王毋西兵，北徇燕、代，南收河內以自廣。

translations.literal: Wish king no west troops, north attack Yan, Dai, south collect Henan to self broaden.
translations.idiomatic: We wish Your Majesty not to send troops west, but to attack north into Yan and Dai, and collect Henan to the south to broaden your territory.'

sentences.zh: 趙南據大河，北有燕、代，楚雖勝秦，必不敢制趙。」

translations.literal: Zhao south occupy great river, north have Yan, Dai, Chu though victory Qin, certainly dare not control Zhao.'
translations.idiomatic: Zhao will occupy the Yellow River to the south and have Yan and Dai to the north. Even if Chu defeats Qin, they will certainly not dare control Zhao.'

sentences.zh: 趙王以為然，因不西兵，而使韓廣略燕，李良略常山，張黡略上黨。

translations.literal: Zhao king considered yes, because not west troops, yet made Han Guang attack Yan, Li Liang attack Changshan, Zhang Yi attack Shangdang.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Zhao considered this correct and therefore did not send troops west. Instead, he sent Han Guang to attack Yan, Li Liang to attack Changshan, and Zhang Yi to attack Shangdang.

translations.literal: Chen king made envoy congratulate Zhao, commanded hasten send troops west enter pass. Zhang Er, Chen Yu persuaded Wu Chen: 'King king Zhao, not Chu intent, special with plan congratulate king. Chu already extinguished Qin, certainly add troops to Zhao. Wish king no west troops, north attack Yan, Dai, south collect Henan to self broaden. Zhao south occupy great river, north have Yan, Dai, Chu though victory Qin, certainly dare not control Zhao.' Zhao king considered yes, because not west troops, yet made Han Guang attack Yan, Li Liang attack Changshan, Zhang Yi attack Shangdang.

sentences.zh: 韓廣至燕，燕人因立廣為燕王。

translations.literal: Han Guang arrived Yan, Yan people because established Guang as Yan king.
translations.idiomatic: Han Guang arrived in Yan, and the people of Yan established him as King of Yan.

sentences.zh: 趙王乃與張耳、陳餘北略地燕界。

translations.literal: Zhao king then with Zhang Er, Chen Yu north attack land Yan border.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Zhao then went with Zhang Er and Chen Yu to attack territory along the Yan border to the north.

sentences.zh: 趙王閒出，為燕軍所得。

translations.literal: Zhao king idle out, by Yan army obtained.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Zhao went out casually and was captured by Yan forces.

sentences.zh: 燕將囚之，欲與分趙地半，乃歸王。

translations.literal: Yan general imprisoned him, wished with divide Zhao land half, then return king.
translations.idiomatic: The Yan general imprisoned him, wishing to divide Zhao territory in half with Zhao, then return the king.

sentences.zh: 使者往，燕輒殺之以求地。

translations.literal: Envoys went, Yan then killed to seek land.
translations.idiomatic: When envoys went, Yan would kill them in order to demand territory.

sentences.zh: 張耳、陳餘患之。

translations.literal: Zhang Er, Chen Yu worried.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er and Chen Yu were troubled by this.

sentences.zh: 有廝養卒謝其舍中曰：「吾為公說燕，與趙王載歸。」

translations.literal: Had servant raised soldier Xie his quarters middle: 'I for you persuade Yan, with Zhao king carriage return.'
translations.idiomatic: There was a servant soldier named Xie in their quarters who said: 'I will persuade Yan for you and return with the King of Zhao in a carriage.'

sentences.zh: 舍中皆笑曰：「使者往十餘輩，輒死，若何以能得王？」

translations.literal: Quarters middle all laughed: 'Envoys went ten plus, then died, how able get king?'
translations.idiomatic: Everyone in the quarters laughed and said: 'More than ten envoys have gone and all died. How could you possibly get the king back?'

sentences.zh: 乃走燕壁。

translations.literal: Then ran Yan wall.
translations.idiomatic: He then ran to the Yan camp.

sentences.zh: 燕將見之，問燕將曰：「知臣何欲？」

translations.literal: Yan general saw him, asked Yan general: 'Know minister what desire?'
translations.idiomatic: The Yan general saw him and asked: 'Do you know what I desire?'

sentences.zh: 燕將曰：「若欲得趙王耳。」

translations.literal: Yan general said: 'If desire get Zhao king only.'
translations.idiomatic: The Yan general said: 'You desire only to get the King of Zhao.'

sentences.zh: 曰：「君知張耳、陳餘何如人也？」

translations.literal: Said: 'Lord know Zhang Er, Chen Yu what like people?'
translations.idiomatic: He said: 'Does my lord know what kind of men Zhang Er and Chen Yu are?'

sentences.zh: 燕將曰：「賢人也。」

translations.literal: Yan general said: 'Worthy people.'
translations.idiomatic: The Yan general said: 'They are worthy men.'

sentences.zh: 曰：「知其志何欲？」

translations.literal: Said: 'Know their will what desire?'
translations.idiomatic: He said: 'Do you know what they desire in their ambitions?'

sentences.zh: 曰：「欲得其王耳。」

translations.literal: Said: 'Desire get their king only.'
translations.idiomatic: He said: 'I only desire to get their king.'

sentences.zh: 趙養卒乃笑曰：「君未知此兩人所欲也。

translations.literal: Zhao servant soldier then laughed: 'Lord unknown this two people what desire.
translations.idiomatic: The Zhao servant soldier then laughed and said: 'My lord does not know what these two men desire.'

sentences.zh: 夫武臣、張耳、陳餘杖馬箠下趙數十城，此亦各欲南面而王，豈欲為卿相終己邪？

translations.literal: Wu Chen, Zhang Er, Chen Yu leaned horse stick down Zhao several ten cities, this also each desire south face king, how desire for minister chancellor end self?
translations.idiomatic: Wu Chen, Zhang Er, and Chen Yu leaned on their horses and conquered tens of Zhao cities with their staffs. Each of them desires to face south and be king—how could they desire to serve as ministers and chancellors for the rest of their lives?'

sentences.zh: 夫臣與主豈可同日而道哉，顧其勢初定，未敢參分而王，且以少長先立武臣為王，以持趙心。

translations.literal: Minister and lord how comparable same day speak, look their situation initial settled, not dare divide three king, moreover with young old first establish Wu Chen as king, to hold Zhao heart.
translations.idiomatic: How can ministers and lords be spoken of in the same breath? Their situation has just been settled, and they dare not divide into three kingdoms and all become kings. For now, considering seniority, they first established Wu Chen as king to hold Zhao's allegiance.'

sentences.zh: 今趙地已服，此兩人亦欲分趙而王，時未可耳。

translations.literal: Now Zhao land already submit, this two people also desire divide Zhao king, time not possible only.
translations.idiomatic: Now that Zhao territory has submitted, these two men also desire to divide Zhao and become kings. The time is not yet right, that's all.'

sentences.zh: 今君乃囚趙王。

translations.literal: Now lord then imprisoned Zhao king.
translations.idiomatic: Now my lord has imprisoned the King of Zhao.'

sentences.zh: 此兩人名為求趙王，實欲燕殺之，此兩人分趙自立。

translations.literal: This two people name seek Zhao king, real desire Yan kill him, this two people divide Zhao self establish.
translations.idiomatic: These two men claim to seek the King of Zhao, but in reality desire Yan to kill him, then they will divide Zhao and establish themselves.'

sentences.zh: 夫以一趙尚易燕，況以兩賢王左提右挈，而責殺王之罪，滅燕易矣。」

translations.literal: With one Zhao still easy Yan, moreover with two worthy kings left hold right lead, yet blame kill king crime, extinguish Yan easy.'
translations.idiomatic: Even with one Zhao it would be easy to conquer Yan, let alone with two worthy kings supporting each other on left and right. They would blame Yan for the crime of killing their king and extinguishing Yan would be easy.'

sentences.zh: 燕將以為然，乃歸趙王，養卒為御而歸。

translations.literal: Yan general considered yes, then returned Zhao king, servant soldier as charioteer returned.
translations.idiomatic: The Yan general considered this correct and returned the King of Zhao. The servant soldier served as charioteer and they returned together.

translations.literal: Han Guang arrived Yan, Yan people because established Guang as Yan king. Zhao king then with Zhang Er, Chen Yu north attack land Yan border. Zhao king idle out, by Yan army obtained. Yan general imprisoned him, wished with divide Zhao land half, then return king. Envoys went, Yan then killed to seek land. Zhang Er, Chen Yu worried. Had servant raised soldier Xie his quarters middle: 'I for you persuade Yan, with Zhao king carriage return.' Quarters middle all laughed: 'Envoys went ten plus, then died, how able get king?' Then ran Yan wall. Yan general saw him, asked Yan general: 'Know minister what desire?' Yan general said: 'If desire get Zhao king only.' Said: 'Lord know Zhang Er, Chen Yu what like people?' Yan general said: 'Worthy people.' Said: 'Know their will what desire?' Said: 'Desire get their king only.' Zhao servant soldier then laughed: 'Lord unknown this two people what desire. Wu Chen, Zhang Er, Chen Yu leaned horse stick down Zhao several ten cities, this also each desire south face king, how desire for minister chancellor end self? Minister and lord how comparable same day speak, look their situation initial settled, not dare divide three king, moreover with young old first establish Wu Chen as king, to hold Zhao heart. Now Zhao land already submit, this two people also desire divide Zhao king, time not possible only. Now lord then imprisoned Zhao king. This two people name seek Zhao king, real desire Yan kill him, this two people divide Zhao self establish. With one Zhao still easy Yan, moreover with two worthy kings left hold right lead, yet blame kill king crime, extinguish Yan easy.' Yan general considered yes, then returned Zhao king, servant soldier as charioteer returned.

sentences.zh: 李良已定常山，還報，趙王復使良略太原。

translations.literal: Li Liang already settled Changshan, returned reported, Zhao king again made Liang attack Taiyuan.
translations.idiomatic: Li Liang had already pacified Changshan and returned to report. The King of Zhao again sent Li Liang to attack Taiyuan.

sentences.zh: 至石邑，秦兵塞井陘，未能前。

translations.literal: Arrived Shiyi, Qin troops blocked Jingxing, not able advance.
translations.idiomatic: He arrived at Shiyi, where Qin troops blocked the Jingxing pass, and he could not advance.

sentences.zh: 秦將詐稱二世使人遺李良書，不封，曰：「良嘗事我得顯幸。

translations.literal: Qin general falsely claimed Second Emperor sent people gave Li Liang letter, not sealed, said: 'Liang once served me got eminent favored.
translations.idiomatic: A Qin general falsely claimed that the Second Emperor had sent someone to deliver a letter to Li Liang, unsealed, which said: 'Liang once served me and gained eminent favor.'

sentences.zh: 良誠能反趙為秦，赦良罪，貴良。」

translations.literal: Liang truly able rebel Zhao for Qin, pardon Liang crime, noble Liang.'
translations.idiomatic: If Liang truly can rebel against Zhao and serve Qin, I will pardon Liang's crimes and ennoble him.'

sentences.zh: 良得書，疑不信。

translations.literal: Liang got letter, doubted not believed.
translations.idiomatic: Li Liang received the letter and was suspicious, not believing it.

sentences.zh: 乃還之邯鄲，益請兵。

translations.literal: Then returned Handan, increased requested troops.
translations.idiomatic: He then returned to Handan and requested additional troops.

sentences.zh: 未至，道逢趙王姊出飲，從百餘騎。

translations.literal: Not arrived, road met Zhao king sister out drink, from hundred plus riders.
translations.idiomatic: Before he arrived, he met the sister of the King of Zhao going out to drink, accompanied by more than a hundred riders.

sentences.zh: 李良望見，以為王，伏謁道旁。

translations.literal: Li Liang gazed saw, considered king, prostrated met road side.
translations.idiomatic: Li Liang gazed and saw her, mistook her for the king, and prostrated himself in greeting by the roadside.

sentences.zh: 王姊醉，不知其將，使騎謝李良。

translations.literal: King sister drunk, not knew his general, made rider thank Li Liang.
translations.idiomatic: The king's sister was drunk and did not recognize that he was a general. She had a rider thank Li Liang.

sentences.zh: 李良素貴，起，慚其從官。

translations.literal: Li Liang originally noble, rose, ashamed his following officials.
translations.idiomatic: Li Liang had always been noble. He rose and was ashamed before his following officials.

sentences.zh: 從官有一人曰：「天下畔秦，能者先立。

translations.literal: Following officials had one person said: 'World rebelled Qin, able ones first establish.
translations.idiomatic: One of his following officials said: 'The world has rebelled against Qin. Those with ability establish themselves first.'

sentences.zh: 且趙王素出將軍下，今女兒乃不為將軍下車，請追殺之。」

translations.literal: Moreover Zhao king originally out general under, now woman then not for general alight carriage, please pursue kill her.'
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, the King of Zhao originally came from under you, general. Now this woman does not even alight from her carriage for you. Please pursue and kill her.'

sentences.zh: 李良已得秦書，固欲反趙，未決，因此怒，遣人追殺王姊道中，乃遂將其兵襲邯鄲。

translations.literal: Li Liang already got Qin letter, firmly wished rebel Zhao, not decided, because this angered, sent people pursue kill king sister road middle, then thus led his troops attack Handan.
translations.idiomatic: Li Liang had already received the Qin letter and firmly wished to rebel against Zhao, though he had not decided. Because of this anger, he sent people to pursue and kill the king's sister on the road, then led his troops to attack Handan.

sentences.zh: 邯鄲不知，竟殺武臣、邵騷。

translations.literal: Handan not knew, unexpectedly killed Wu Chen, Shao Sao.
translations.idiomatic: Handan was unprepared and unexpectedly killed Wu Chen and Shao Sao.

sentences.zh: 趙人多為張耳、陳餘耳目者，以故得脫出。

translations.literal: Zhao people many for Zhang Er, Chen Yu eyes ears, because got escape out.
translations.idiomatic: Many Zhao people served as eyes and ears for Zhang Er and Chen Yu, so they were able to escape.

sentences.zh: 收其兵，得數萬人。

translations.literal: Collected their troops, got several ten thousand persons.
translations.idiomatic: They gathered their troops and obtained tens of thousands of men.

sentences.zh: 客有說張耳曰：「兩君羈旅，而欲附趙，難；

translations.literal: Guest had persuaded Zhang Er: 'Two lords wandering, wish attach Zhao, difficult;
translations.idiomatic: A guest persuaded Zhang Er: 'You two lords are wanderers. To wish to attach yourselves to Zhao would be difficult;'

sentences.zh: 獨立趙後，扶以義，可就功。」

translations.literal: Alone establish Zhao posterity, support with righteousness, can achieve merit.'
translations.idiomatic: To independently establish a descendant of Zhao and support him with righteousness would allow you to achieve merit.'

sentences.zh: 乃求得趙歇，立為趙王，居信都。

translations.literal: Then sought got Zhao Xie, established as Zhao king, dwelt Xindu.
translations.idiomatic: They then sought out and obtained Zhao Xie, established him as King of Zhao, and he dwelt in Xindu.

sentences.zh: 李良進兵擊陳餘，陳餘敗李良，李良走歸章邯。

translations.literal: Li Liang advanced troops attacked Chen Yu, Chen Yu defeated Li Liang, Li Liang fled returned Zhang Han.
translations.idiomatic: Li Liang advanced his troops and attacked Chen Yu. Chen Yu defeated Li Liang, and Li Liang fled back to Zhang Han.

translations.literal: Li Liang already settled Changshan, returned reported, Zhao king again made Liang attack Taiyuan. Arrived Shiyi, Qin troops blocked Jingxing, not able advance. Qin general falsely claimed Second Emperor sent people gave Li Liang letter, not sealed, said: 'Liang once served me got eminent favored. Liang truly able rebel Zhao for Qin, pardon Liang crime, noble Liang.' Liang got letter, doubted not believed. Then returned Handan, increased requested troops. Not arrived, road met Zhao king sister out drink, from hundred plus riders. Li Liang gazed saw, considered king, prostrated met road side. King sister drunk, not knew his general, made rider thank Li Liang. Li Liang originally noble, rose, ashamed his following officials. Following officials had one person said: 'World rebelled Qin, able ones first establish. Moreover Zhao king originally out general under, now woman then not for general alight carriage, please pursue kill her.' Li Liang already got Qin letter, firmly wished rebel Zhao, not decided, because this angered, sent people pursue kill king sister road middle, then thus led his troops attack Handan. Handan not knew, unexpectedly killed Wu Chen, Shao Sao. Zhao people many for Zhang Er, Chen Yu eyes ears, because got escape out. Collected their troops, got several ten thousand persons. Guest had persuaded Zhang Er: 'Two lords wandering, wish attach Zhao, difficult; Alone establish Zhao posterity, support with righteousness, can achieve merit.' Then sought got Zhao Xie, established as Zhao king, dwelt Xindu. Li Liang advanced troops attacked Chen Yu, Chen Yu defeated Li Liang, Li Liang fled returned Zhang Han.

sentences.zh: 章邯引兵至邯鄲，皆徙其民河內，夷其城郭。

translations.literal: Zhang Han led troops arrived Handan, all moved its people Henan, razed its city walls.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Han led his troops to Handan, moved all its people to Henan, and razed its city walls.

sentences.zh: 張耳與趙王歇走入鉅鹿城，王離圍之。

translations.literal: Zhang Er with Zhao king Xie fled entered Julu city, Wang Li surrounded it.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er and King Xie of Zhao fled into Julu city, and Wang Li surrounded it.

sentences.zh: 陳餘北收常山兵，得數萬人，軍鉅鹿北。

translations.literal: Chen Yu north collected Changshan troops, got several ten thousand persons, army Julu north.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu collected troops from Changshan to the north, obtained tens of thousands of men, and positioned his army north of Julu.

sentences.zh: 章邯軍鉅鹿南棘原，筑甬道屬河，餉王離。

translations.literal: Zhang Han army Julu south Jiyuan, built passageway connected river, supplied Wang Li.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Han positioned his army at Jiyuan south of Julu, built a covered passageway connecting to the river, and supplied Wang Li.

sentences.zh: 王離兵食多，急攻鉅鹿。

translations.literal: Wang Li troops provisions many, urgent attacked Julu.
translations.idiomatic: Wang Li had abundant troops and provisions, and urgently attacked Julu.

sentences.zh: 鉅鹿城中食盡兵少，張耳數使人召前陳餘，陳餘自度兵少，不敵秦，不敢前。

translations.literal: Julu city middle provisions exhausted troops few, Zhang Er several times sent people summoned former Chen Yu, Chen Yu self measured troops few, not enemy Qin, dared not advance.
translations.idiomatic: In Julu city, provisions were exhausted and troops few. Zhang Er repeatedly sent people to summon Chen Yu to advance, but Chen Yu measured that his troops were few and could not match Qin, so he dared not advance.

sentences.zh: 數月，張耳大怒，怨陳餘，使張黶、陳澤往讓陳餘曰：「始吾與公為刎頸交，今王與耳旦暮且死，而公擁兵數萬，不肯相救，安在其相為死！

translations.literal: Several months, Zhang Er greatly angered, resented Chen Yu, made Zhang Yi, Chen Ze went reproached Chen Yu: 'Beginning I with you became neck-cutting friendship, now king with Er morning evening then die, yet you possess troops several ten thousand, not willing mutually save, where its mutually die!
translations.idiomatic: After several months, Zhang Er became greatly angered and resented Chen Yu. He sent Zhang Yi and Chen Ze to reproach Chen Yu: 'At first you and I became sworn brothers willing to die for each other. Now the king and I face death morning and evening, yet you possess tens of thousands of troops and refuse to save us. Where is our promise to die for each other!'

sentences.zh: 茍必信，胡不赴秦軍俱死？

translations.literal: If certainly trust, why not go Qin army together die?
translations.idiomatic: If you are certainly trustworthy, why not go attack the Qin army and die together?'

sentences.zh: 且有十一二相全。」

translations.literal: Moreover have one ten two mutually whole.'
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, there is a one in ten or two in ten chance that we might all survive.'

sentences.zh: 陳餘曰：「吾度前終不能救趙，徒盡亡軍。

translations.literal: Chen Yu said: 'I measure advance finally cannot save Zhao, in vain exhaust perish army.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu said: 'I measure that advancing will ultimately not save Zhao, and will only exhaust and destroy the army in vain.'

sentences.zh: 且餘所以不俱死，欲為趙王、張君報秦。

translations.literal: Moreover Yu what not together die, wish for Zhao king, Zhang jun report Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, the reason I do not die together with you is that I wish to avenge the King of Zhao and Lord Zhang against Qin.'

sentences.zh: 今必俱死，如以肉委餓虎，何益？」

translations.literal: Now certainly together die, like with meat give hungry tiger, what benefit?'
translations.idiomatic: Now if we must die together, it is like giving meat to a hungry tiger—what benefit is there?'

sentences.zh: 張黶、陳澤曰：「事已急，要以俱死立信，安知後慮！」

translations.literal: Zhang Yi, Chen Ze said: 'Matter already urgent, important with together die establish trust, how know later consideration!'
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Yi and Chen Ze said: 'The matter is already urgent. It is important to establish trust by dying together—how can we know about future considerations!'

sentences.zh: 陳餘曰：「吾死顧以為無益。

translations.literal: Chen Yu said: 'I die consider as no benefit.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu said: 'I consider that my dying now would be of no benefit.'

sentences.zh: 必如公言。」

translations.literal: Certainly like you say.'
translations.idiomatic: I will certainly do as you say.'

sentences.zh: 乃使五千人令張黶、陳澤先嘗秦軍，至皆沒。

translations.literal: Then made five thousand commanded Zhang Yi, Chen Ze first test Qin army, arrived all perished.
translations.idiomatic: He then sent five thousand men commanded by Zhang Yi and Chen Ze to first test the Qin army. When they arrived, they all perished.

translations.literal: Zhang Han led troops arrived Handan, all moved its people Henan, razed its city walls. Zhang Er with Zhao king Xie fled entered Julu city, Wang Li surrounded it. Chen Yu north collected Changshan troops, got several ten thousand persons, army Julu north. Zhang Han army Julu south Jiyuan, built passageway connected river, supplied Wang Li. Wang Li troops provisions many, urgent attacked Julu. Julu city middle provisions exhausted troops few, Zhang Er several times sent people summoned former Chen Yu, Chen Yu self measured troops few, not enemy Qin, dared not advance. Several months, Zhang Er greatly angered, resented Chen Yu, made Zhang Yi, Chen Ze went reproached Chen Yu: 'Beginning I with you became neck-cutting friendship, now king with Er morning evening then die, yet you possess troops several ten thousand, not willing mutually save, where its mutually die! If certainly trust, why not go Qin army together die? Moreover have one ten two mutually whole.' Chen Yu said: 'I measure advance finally cannot save Zhao, in vain exhaust perish army. Moreover Yu what not together die, wish for Zhao king, Zhang jun report Qin. Now certainly together die, like with meat give hungry tiger, what benefit?' Zhang Yi, Chen Ze said: 'Matter already urgent, important with together die establish trust, how know later consideration!' Chen Yu said: 'I die consider as no benefit. Certainly like you say.' Then made five thousand commanded Zhang Yi, Chen Ze first test Qin army, arrived all perished.

sentences.zh: 當是時，燕、齊、楚聞趙急，皆來救。

translations.literal: When this time, Yan, Qi, Chu heard Zhao urgent, all came save.
translations.idiomatic: At this time, Yan, Qi, and Chu heard that Zhao was in dire straits and all came to rescue it.

sentences.zh: 張敖亦北收代兵，得萬餘人，來，皆壁餘旁，未敢擊秦。

translations.literal: Zhang Ao also north collected Dai troops, got ten thousand plus persons, came, all walled Chen Yu side, not dared attack Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Ao also collected troops from Dai to the north, obtained more than ten thousand men, and came. They all encamped beside Chen Yu but dared not attack Qin.

sentences.zh: 項羽兵數絕章邯甬道，王離軍乏食，項羽悉引兵渡河，遂破章邯。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu troops several times cut Zhang Han passageway, Wang Li army lacked provisions, Xiang Yu all led troops crossed river, then broke Zhang Han.
translations.idiomatic: Xiang Yu's troops repeatedly cut Zhang Han's covered passageway. Wang Li's army lacked provisions. Xiang Yu led all his troops across the river and defeated Zhang Han.

sentences.zh: 章邯引兵解，諸侯軍乃敢擊圍鉅鹿秦軍，遂虜王離。

translations.literal: Zhang Han led troops retreated, various lords army then dared attack surrounded Julu Qin army, then captured Wang Li.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Han led his troops in retreat. The various lords' armies then dared to attack and surround the Qin army at Julu, and captured Wang Li.

sentences.zh: 涉閒自殺。

translations.literal: She Jian suicide.
translations.idiomatic: Sima Xin committed suicide.

sentences.zh: 卒存鉅鹿者，楚力也。

translations.literal: Finally preserved Julu, Chu strength.
translations.idiomatic: In the end, Julu was preserved by Chu's strength.

translations.literal: When this time, Yan, Qi, Chu heard Zhao urgent, all came save. Zhang Ao also north collected Dai troops, got ten thousand plus persons, came, all walled Chen Yu side, not dared attack Qin. Xiang Yu troops several times cut Zhang Han passageway, Wang Li army lacked provisions, Xiang Yu all led troops crossed river, then broke Zhang Han. Zhang Han led troops retreated, various lords army then dared attack surrounded Julu Qin army, then captured Wang Li. She Jian suicide. Finally preserved Julu, Chu strength.

sentences.zh: 於是趙王歇、張耳乃得出鉅鹿，謝諸侯。

translations.literal: Then Zhao king Xie, Zhang Er then able exit Julu, thanked various lords.
translations.idiomatic: Thus King Xie of Zhao and Zhang Er were able to emerge from Julu and thank the various lords.

sentences.zh: 張耳與陳餘相見，責讓陳餘以不肯救趙，及問張黶、陳澤所在。

translations.literal: Zhang Er with Chen Yu met, blamed reproached Chen Yu with not willing save Zhao, and asked Zhang Yi, Chen Ze location.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er met with Chen Yu, blamed and reproached him for refusing to save Zhao, and asked about the whereabouts of Zhang Yi and Chen Ze.

sentences.zh: 陳餘怒曰：「張黶、陳澤以必死責臣，臣使將五千人先嘗秦軍，皆沒不出。」

translations.literal: Chen Yu angered: 'Zhang Yi, Chen Ze with certain die blamed minister, minister made lead five thousand first test Qin army, all perished not out.'
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu angrily said: 'Zhang Yi and Chen Ze blamed me with demands that I must die. I had them lead five thousand men to first test the Qin army, and they all perished without returning.'

sentences.zh: 張耳不信，以為殺之，數問陳餘。

translations.literal: Zhang Er not believed, considered killed them, several times asked Chen Yu.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er did not believe him and thought he had killed them. He repeatedly questioned Chen Yu.

sentences.zh: 陳餘怒曰：「不意君之望臣深也！

translations.literal: Chen Yu angered: 'Not expected lord hope minister deep!
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu angrily said: 'I did not expect you to suspect me so deeply!'

sentences.zh: 豈以臣為重去將哉？」

translations.literal: How with minister heavy abandon general?'
translations.idiomatic: Do you think I would value abandoning my generalship?'

sentences.zh: 乃脫解印綬，推予張耳。

translations.literal: Then removed untied seal ribbon, pushed gave Zhang Er.
translations.idiomatic: He then removed and untied his seal and ribbon and pushed them toward Zhang Er.

sentences.zh: 張耳亦愕不受。

translations.literal: Zhang Er also astonished not accepted.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er was also astonished and did not accept them.

sentences.zh: 陳餘起如廁。

translations.literal: Chen Yu rose like latrine.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu rose as if going to the latrine.

sentences.zh: 客有說張耳曰：「臣聞『天與不取，反受其咎』。

translations.literal: Guest had persuaded Zhang Er: 'Minister heard 'Heaven give not take, instead receive its misfortune'.
translations.idiomatic: A guest persuaded Zhang Er: 'Your servant has heard: "What Heaven gives and you do not take, instead brings misfortune."'

sentences.zh: 今陳將軍與君印，君不受，反天不祥。

translations.literal: Now Chen general give lord seal, lord not accept, instead heaven not auspicious.
translations.idiomatic: Now General Chen gives you his seal. If you do not accept it, you go against Heaven and it is inauspicious.'

sentences.zh: 急取之！」

translations.literal: Urgent take it!'
translations.idiomatic: Take it quickly!'

sentences.zh: 張耳乃佩其印，收其麾下。

translations.literal: Zhang Er then wore his seal, collected his banner under.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er then wore the seal and collected Chen Yu's troops under his banner.

sentences.zh: 而陳餘還，亦望張耳不讓，遂趨出。

translations.literal: Yet Chen Yu returned, also hoped Zhang Er not yield, then hurried out.
translations.idiomatic: When Chen Yu returned, he also hoped Zhang Er would not yield, then he hurried out.

sentences.zh: 張耳遂收其兵。

translations.literal: Zhang Er then collected his troops.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er then collected Chen Yu's troops.

sentences.zh: 陳餘獨與麾下所善數百人之河上澤中漁獵。

translations.literal: Chen Yu alone with banner under good several hundred persons river upper marsh middle fished hunted.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu alone went with several hundred of his banner men he was close to, fishing and hunting in the marshes along the river.

sentences.zh: 由此陳餘、張耳遂有卻。

translations.literal: By this Chen Yu, Zhang Er then had rift.
translations.idiomatic: From this, Chen Yu and Zhang Er developed a rift.

translations.literal: Then Zhao king Xie, Zhang Er then able exit Julu, thanked various lords. Zhang Er with Chen Yu met, blamed reproached Chen Yu with not willing save Zhao, and asked Zhang Yi, Chen Ze location. Chen Yu angered: 'Zhang Yi, Chen Ze with certain die blamed minister, minister made lead five thousand first test Qin army, all perished not out.' Zhang Er not believed, considered killed them, several times asked Chen Yu. Chen Yu angered: 'Not expected lord hope minister deep! How with minister heavy abandon general?' Then removed untied seal ribbon, pushed gave Zhang Er. Zhang Er also astonished not accepted. Chen Yu rose like latrine. Guest had persuaded Zhang Er: 'Minister heard 'Heaven give not take, instead receive its misfortune'. Now Chen general give lord seal, lord not accept, instead heaven not auspicious. Urgent take it!' Zhang Er then wore his seal, collected his banner under. Yet Chen Yu returned, also hoped Zhang Er not yield, then hurried out. Zhang Er then collected his troops. Chen Yu alone with banner under good several hundred persons river upper marsh middle fished hunted. By this Chen Yu, Zhang Er then had rift.

sentences.zh: 趙王歇復居信都。

translations.literal: Zhao king Xie again dwelt Xindu.
translations.idiomatic: King Xie of Zhao again dwelt in Xindu.

sentences.zh: 張耳從項羽諸侯入關。

translations.literal: Zhang Er followed Xiang Yu various lords entered pass.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er followed Xiang Yu and the various lords into the pass.

sentences.zh: 漢元年二月，項羽立諸侯王，張耳雅游，人多為之言，項羽亦素數聞張耳賢，乃分趙立張耳為常山王，治信都。

translations.literal: Han first year second month, Xiang Yu established various lords kings, Zhang Er elegantly wandered, people many for him spoke, Xiang Yu also originally several times heard Zhang Er worthy, then divided Zhao established Zhang Er as Changshan king, governed Xindu.
translations.idiomatic: In the second month of the first year of Han, Xiang Yu established the various lords as kings. Zhang Er had elegant manners and many people spoke well of him. Xiang Yu had also long heard of Zhang Er's worth many times. He then divided Zhao and established Zhang Er as King of Changshan, governing Xindu.

sentences.zh: 信都更名襄國。

translations.literal: Xindu changed name Xiangguo.
translations.idiomatic: Xindu was renamed Xiangguo.

translations.literal: Zhao king Xie again dwelt Xindu. Zhang Er followed Xiang Yu various lords entered pass. Han first year second month, Xiang Yu established various lords kings, Zhang Er elegantly wandered, people many for him spoke, Xiang Yu also originally several times heard Zhang Er worthy, then divided Zhao established Zhang Er as Changshan king, governed Xindu. Xindu changed name Xiangguo.

sentences.zh: 陳餘客多說項羽曰：「陳餘、張耳一體有功於趙。」

translations.literal: Chen Yu guests many persuaded Xiang Yu: 'Chen Yu, Zhang Er one body have merit to Zhao.'
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu's guests repeatedly persuaded Xiang Yu: 'Chen Yu and Zhang Er are as one in their merit to Zhao.'

sentences.zh: 項羽以陳餘不從入關，聞其在南皮，即以南皮旁三縣以封之，而徙趙王歇王代。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu because Chen Yu not followed entered pass, heard him at Nanpi, then with Nanpi side three counties sealed him, yet moved Zhao king Xie king Dai.
translations.idiomatic: Because Chen Yu had not followed him into the pass, Xiang Yu heard he was at Nanpi and enfeoffed him with Nanpi and three neighboring counties, but moved King Xie of Zhao to be king of Dai.

translations.literal: Chen Yu guests many persuaded Xiang Yu: 'Chen Yu, Zhang Er one body have merit to Zhao.' Xiang Yu because Chen Yu not followed entered pass, heard him at Nanpi, then with Nanpi side three counties sealed him, yet moved Zhao king Xie king Dai.

sentences.zh: 張耳之國，陳餘愈益怒，曰：「張耳與餘功等也，今張耳王，餘獨侯，此項羽不平。」

translations.literal: Zhang Er to country, Chen Yu increasingly angered, said: 'Zhang Er with Yu merit equal, now Zhang Er king, Yu alone marquis, this Xiang Yu not fair.'
translations.idiomatic: When Zhang Er went to his kingdom, Chen Yu grew increasingly angry and said: 'Zhang Er and I have equal merit. Now Zhang Er is king while I alone am a marquis. This is Xiang Yu being unfair.'

sentences.zh: 及齊王田榮畔楚，陳餘乃使夏說說田榮曰：「項羽為天下宰不平，盡王諸將善地，徙故王王惡地，今趙王乃居代！

translations.literal: When Qi king Tian Rong rebelled Chu, Chen Yu then made Xia Shuo persuade Tian Rong: 'Xiang Yu as world overseer not fair, exhausted king various generals good land, moved former kings king bad land, now Zhao king then dwelt Dai!
translations.idiomatic: When King Tian Rong of Qi rebelled against Chu, Chen Yu sent Xia Shuo to persuade Tian Rong: 'Xiang Yu as overseer of the world is unfair. He gives all the good lands to the generals he makes kings, but moves the former kings to bad lands. Now the King of Zhao dwells in Dai!'

sentences.zh: 願王假臣兵，請以南皮為捍蔽。」

translations.literal: Wish king lend minister troops, please with Nanpi as defense screen.'
translations.idiomatic: I wish Your Majesty to lend me troops. Please let Nanpi serve as my defensive screen.'

sentences.zh: 田榮欲樹黨於趙以反楚，乃遣兵從陳餘。

translations.literal: Tian Rong wished plant party at Zhao to rebel Chu, then sent troops followed Chen Yu.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Rong wished to build a party in Zhao to rebel against Chu, so he sent troops to follow Chen Yu.

sentences.zh: 陳餘因悉三縣兵襲常山王張耳。

translations.literal: Chen Yu because all three counties troops attacked Changshan king Zhang Er.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu then gathered all the troops from the three counties and attacked King Zhang Er of Changshan.

sentences.zh: 張耳敗走，念諸侯無可歸者，曰：「漢王與我有舊故，而項羽又彊，立我，我欲之楚。」

translations.literal: Zhang Er defeated fled, thought various lords none could return, said: 'Han king with I have old friendship, yet Xiang Yu again strong, established me, I wish Chu.'
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er was defeated and fled. He thought there was no feudal lord he could return to and said: 'The King of Han and I have old ties, but Xiang Yu is strong again. If he establishes me, I wish to go to Chu.'

sentences.zh: 甘公曰：「漢王之入關，五星聚東井。

translations.literal: Gan Gong said: 'Han king enter pass, five stars gathered Dongjing.
translations.idiomatic: Gan Gong said: 'When the King of Han entered the pass, five stars gathered in Dongjing.'

sentences.zh: 東井者，秦分也。

translations.literal: Dongjing, Qin portion.
translations.idiomatic: Dongjing is Qin's portion.'

sentences.zh: 先至必霸。

translations.literal: First arrive certainly hegemon.
translations.idiomatic: The first to arrive will certainly become hegemon.'

sentences.zh: 楚雖彊，後必屬漢。」

translations.literal: Chu though strong, later certainly belong Han.'
translations.idiomatic: Though Chu is strong, later it will certainly belong to Han.'

sentences.zh: 故耳走漢。

translations.literal: Thus Er fled Han.
translations.idiomatic: Thus Zhang Er fled to Han.

sentences.zh: 漢王亦還定三秦，方圍章邯廢丘。

translations.literal: Han king also returned settled three Qin, just surrounded Zhang Han Fei Qiu.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Han had also returned and pacified the three Qin regions. He was just besieging Zhang Han at Fei Qiu.

sentences.zh: 張耳謁漢王，漢王厚遇之。

translations.literal: Zhang Er met Han king, Han king thick treated him.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Er paid his respects to the King of Han, and the King of Han treated him generously.

translations.literal: Zhang Er to country, Chen Yu increasingly angered, said: 'Zhang Er with Yu merit equal, now Zhang Er king, Yu alone marquis, this Xiang Yu not fair.' When Qi king Tian Rong rebelled Chu, Chen Yu then made Xia Shuo persuade Tian Rong: 'Xiang Yu as world overseer not fair, exhausted king various generals good land, moved former kings king bad land, now Zhao king then dwelt Dai! Wish king lend minister troops, please with Nanpi as defense screen.' Tian Rong wished plant party at Zhao to rebel Chu, then sent troops followed Chen Yu. Chen Yu because all three counties troops attacked Changshan king Zhang Er. Zhang Er defeated fled, thought various lords none could return, said: 'Han king with I have old friendship, yet Xiang Yu again strong, established me, I wish Chu.' Gan Gong said: 'Han king enter pass, five stars gathered Dongjing. Dongjing, Qin portion. First arrive certainly hegemon. Chu though strong, later certainly belong Han.' Thus Er fled Han. Han king also returned settled three Qin, just surrounded Zhang Han Fei Qiu. Zhang Er met Han king, Han king thick treated him.

sentences.zh: 陳餘已敗張耳，皆復收趙地，迎趙王於代，復為趙王。

translations.literal: Chen Yu already defeated Zhang Er, all again collected Zhao land, welcomed Zhao king at Dai, again as Zhao king.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu had already defeated Zhang Er and recovered all of Zhao territory. He welcomed the King of Zhao from Dai and restored him as King of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙王德陳餘，立以為代王。

translations.literal: Zhao king virtue Chen Yu, established him as Dai king.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Zhao, grateful to Chen Yu, established him as King of Dai.

sentences.zh: 陳餘為趙王弱，國初定，不之國，留傅趙王，而使夏說以相國守代。

translations.literal: Chen Yu considered Zhao king weak, country initial settled, not went country, stayed assisted Zhao king, yet made Xia Shuo with chancellor guard Dai.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu considered the King of Zhao weak and the country newly settled, so he did not go to his kingdom. He stayed to assist the King of Zhao, sending Xia Shuo as chancellor to guard Dai.

translations.literal: Chen Yu already defeated Zhang Er, all again collected Zhao land, welcomed Zhao king at Dai, again as Zhao king. Zhao king virtue Chen Yu, established him as Dai king. Chen Yu considered Zhao king weak, country initial settled, not went country, stayed assisted Zhao king, yet made Xia Shuo with chancellor guard Dai.

sentences.zh: 漢二年，東擊楚，使使告趙，欲與俱。

translations.literal: Han second year, east attacked Chu, made envoy told Zhao, wished with together.
translations.idiomatic: In the second year of Han, he attacked Chu to the east and sent envoys to tell Zhao, wishing to join forces with them.

sentences.zh: 陳餘曰：「漢殺張耳乃從。」

translations.literal: Chen Yu said: 'Han kill Zhang Er then follow.'
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu said: 'Only if Han kills Zhang Er will we follow.'

sentences.zh: 於是漢王求人類張耳者斬之，持其頭遺陳餘。

translations.literal: Then Han king sought similar Zhang Er persons beheaded them, held their heads sent Chen Yu.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Han then sought out people who resembled Zhang Er, beheaded them, and sent their heads to Chen Yu.

sentences.zh: 陳餘乃遣兵助漢。

translations.literal: Chen Yu then sent troops helped Han.
translations.idiomatic: Chen Yu then sent troops to assist Han.

sentences.zh: 漢之敗於彭城西，陳餘亦復覺張耳不死，即背漢。

translations.literal: Han defeated at Pengcheng west, Chen Yu also again knew Zhang Er not dead, then betrayed Han.
translations.idiomatic: When Han was defeated west of Pengcheng, Chen Yu also realized again that Zhang Er was not dead, and immediately betrayed Han.

translations.literal: Han second year, east attacked Chu, made envoy told Zhao, wished with together. Chen Yu said: 'Han kill Zhang Er then follow.' Then Han king sought similar Zhang Er persons beheaded them, held their heads sent Chen Yu. Chen Yu then sent troops helped Han. Han defeated at Pengcheng west, Chen Yu also again knew Zhang Er not dead, then betrayed Han.

sentences.zh: 漢三年，韓信已定魏地，遣張耳與韓信擊破趙井陘，斬陳餘泜水上，追殺趙王歇襄國。

translations.literal: Han third year, Han Xin already settled Wei land, sent Zhang Er with Han Xin attacked broke Zhao Jingxing, beheaded Chen Yu Wei water above, pursued killed Zhao king Xie Xiangguo.
translations.idiomatic: In the third year of Han, Han Xin had already pacified Wei territory. He sent Zhang Er with Han Xin to attack and break Zhao at Jingxing, beheading Chen Yu on the Wei River, and pursuing to kill King Xie of Zhao in Xiangguo.

sentences.zh: 漢立張耳為趙王。

translations.literal: Han established Zhang Er as Zhao king.
translations.idiomatic: Han established Zhang Er as King of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 漢五年，張耳薨，謚為景王。

translations.literal: Han fifth year, Zhang Er died, posthumous title Jing Wang.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth year of Han, Zhang Er died and was posthumously titled King Jing.

sentences.zh: 子敖嗣立為趙王。

translations.literal: Son Ao succeeded established as Zhao king.
translations.idiomatic: His son Ao succeeded him as King of Zhao.

sentences.zh: 高祖長女魯元公主為趙王敖后。

translations.literal: Gao Zu eldest daughter Lu Yuan princess for Zhao king Ao empress.
translations.idiomatic: Gao Zu's eldest daughter, Princess Lu Yuan, became the wife of King Ao of Zhao.

translations.literal: Han third year, Han Xin already settled Wei land, sent Zhang Er with Han Xin attacked broke Zhao Jingxing, beheaded Chen Yu Wei water above, pursued killed Zhao king Xie Xiangguo. Han established Zhang Er as Zhao king. Han fifth year, Zhang Er died, posthumous title Jing Wang. Son Ao succeeded established as Zhao king. Gao Zu eldest daughter Lu Yuan princess for Zhao king Ao empress.

sentences.zh: 漢七年，高祖從平城過趙，趙王朝夕袒韛蔽，自上食，禮甚卑，有子婿禮。

translations.literal: Han seventh year, Gao Zu from Pingcheng passed Zhao, Zhao king morning evening bare back mat covered, self served food, ritual very humble, had son-in-law ritual.
translations.idiomatic: In the seventh year of Han, Gao Zu passed through Zhao on his way from Pingcheng. The King of Zhao bared his back and covered himself with mats morning and evening, personally served food, and performed extremely humble rituals, treating Gao Zu as a father-in-law.

sentences.zh: 高祖箕踞詈，甚慢易之。

translations.literal: Gao Zu sat cross-legged cursed, very slighted him.
translations.idiomatic: Gao Zu sat cross-legged and cursed, treating him with great contempt.

sentences.zh: 趙相貫高、趙午等年六十餘，故張耳客也。

translations.literal: Zhao chancellor Guan Gao, Zhao Wu etc. year sixty plus, originally Zhang Er guests.
translations.idiomatic: The Zhao chancellor Guan Gao, Zhao Wu, and others were over sixty years old and had originally been guests of Zhang Er.

sentences.zh: 生平為氣，乃怒曰：「吾王孱王也！」

translations.literal: Lifetime for spirit, then angered: 'My king weak king!'
