translations.idiomatic: They had always been spirited men, and now they were angry, saying: 'Our king is a weak king!'

sentences.zh: 說王曰：「夫天下豪桀并起，能者先立。

translations.literal: Persuaded king: 'World heroes together rise, able ones first establish.
translations.idiomatic: They persuaded the king: 'Indeed, heroes throughout the world have risen together. Those with ability establish themselves first.'

sentences.zh: 今王事高祖甚恭，而高祖無禮，請為王殺之！」

translations.literal: Now king serves Gao Zu very respectful, yet Gao Zu no ritual, please for king kill him!'
translations.idiomatic: Now Your Majesty serves Gao Zu very respectfully, yet Gao Zu shows no courtesy. Please allow us to kill him for Your Majesty!'

sentences.zh: 張敖齧其指出血，曰：「君何言之誤！

translations.literal: Zhang Ao bit his finger blood came out: 'Lord what speak mistake!
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Ao bit his finger until blood came out and said: 'My lord, how mistaken your words are!'

sentences.zh: 且先人亡國，賴高祖得復國，德流子孫，秋豪皆高祖力也。

translations.literal: Moreover ancestors perished country, relied Gao Zu got restore country, virtue flowed descendants, autumn hair all Gao Zu strength.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, our ancestors lost their country. We relied on Gao Zu to restore it. His virtue flows to our descendants—even the finest hair depends on Gao Zu's strength.'

sentences.zh: 願君無復出口。」

translations.literal: Wish lord no again speak out.'
translations.idiomatic: I wish you gentlemen would not speak of this again.'

sentences.zh: 貫高、趙午等十餘人皆相謂曰：「乃吾等非也。

translations.literal: Guan Gao, Zhao Wu etc. ten plus persons all mutually said: 'Then we etc. wrong.
translations.idiomatic: Guan Gao, Zhao Wu, and more than ten others all said to each other: 'Then we were wrong.'

sentences.zh: 吾王長者，不倍德。

translations.literal: My king elder, not double virtue.
translations.idiomatic: Our king is a man of honor and does not betray virtue.'

sentences.zh: 且吾等義不辱，今怨高祖辱我王，故欲殺之，何乃汙王為乎？

translations.literal: Moreover we etc. righteousness not humiliated, now resent Gao Zu humiliate my king, thus wish kill him, why then dirty king?
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, we are men of righteousness and cannot bear humiliation. Now we resent Gao Zu humiliating our king, so we wish to kill him. Why should we implicate the king?'

sentences.zh: 令事成歸王，事敗獨身坐耳。」

translations.literal: Make matter succeed return king, matter fail alone body sit.'
translations.idiomatic: If the matter succeeds, the credit goes to the king; if it fails, we alone will bear the consequences.'

translations.literal: Han seventh year, Gao Zu from Pingcheng passed Zhao, Zhao king morning evening bare back mat covered, self served food, ritual very humble, had son-in-law ritual. Gao Zu sat cross-legged cursed, very slighted him. Zhao chancellor Guan Gao, Zhao Wu etc. year sixty plus, originally Zhang Er guests. Lifetime for spirit, then angered: 'My king weak king!' Persuaded king: 'World heroes together rise, able ones first establish. Now king serves Gao Zu very respectful, yet Gao Zu no ritual, please for king kill him!' Zhang Ao bit his finger blood came out: 'Lord what speak mistake! Moreover ancestors perished country, relied Gao Zu got restore country, virtue flowed descendants, autumn hair all Gao Zu strength. Wish lord no again speak out.' Guan Gao, Zhao Wu etc. ten plus persons all mutually said: 'Then we etc. wrong. My king elder, not double virtue. Moreover we etc. righteousness not humiliated, now resent Gao Zu humiliate my king, thus wish kill him, why then dirty king? Make matter succeed return king, matter fail alone body sit.'

sentences.zh: 漢八年，上從東垣還，過趙，貫高等乃壁人柏人，要之置廁。

translations.literal: Han eighth year, emperor from Dongyuan returned, passed Zhao, Guan Gao etc. then walled people Bo Ren, intercepted him placed latrine.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighth year of Han, the emperor returned from Dongyuan and passed through Zhao. Guan Gao and his followers walled up people in Bo Ren and intercepted him, placing him in the latrine.

sentences.zh: 上過欲宿，心動，問曰：「縣名為何？」

translations.literal: Emperor passed wished lodge, heart moved, asked: 'County name what?'
translations.idiomatic: As the emperor passed through and wished to lodge there, his heart stirred and he asked: 'What is the name of this county?'

sentences.zh: 曰：「柏人。」

translations.literal: Said: 'Bo Ren.'
translations.idiomatic: He was told: 'Bo Ren.'

sentences.zh: 「柏人者，迫於人也！」

translations.literal: 'Bo Ren, pressed by person!'
translations.idiomatic: 'Bo Ren means "pressed by people"!'

sentences.zh: 不宿而去。

translations.literal: Not lodged went.
translations.idiomatic: He did not lodge there and left.

translations.literal: Han eighth year, emperor from Dongyuan returned, passed Zhao, Guan Gao etc. then walled people Bo Ren, intercepted him placed latrine. Emperor passed wished lodge, heart moved, asked: 'County name what?' Said: 'Bo Ren.' 'Bo Ren, pressed by person!' Not lodged went.

sentences.zh: 漢九年，貫高怨家知其謀，乃上變告之。

translations.literal: Han ninth year, Guan Gao resent family knew his plot, then presented change reported it.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth year of Han, someone who resented Guan Gao learned of his plot and presented a report of the treason.

sentences.zh: 於是上皆并逮捕趙王、貫高等。

translations.literal: Then emperor all together arrested Zhao king, Guan Gao etc.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor then arrested the King of Zhao, Guan Gao, and all the others.

sentences.zh: 十餘人皆爭自剄，貫高獨怒罵曰：「誰令公為之？

translations.literal: Ten plus persons all contended self cut throat, Guan Gao alone angered cursed: 'Who make you do it?
translations.idiomatic: More than ten people all contended to cut their own throats. Guan Gao alone angrily cursed: 'Who made you do this?'

sentences.zh: 今王實無謀，而并捕王；

translations.literal: Now king really no plot, yet together arrest king;
translations.idiomatic: Now the king truly had no plot, yet you all arrest the king together;

sentences.zh: 公等皆死，誰白王不反者！」

translations.literal: You etc. all die, who clear king not rebel!'
translations.idiomatic: If you all die, who will clear the king of the charge of rebellion!'

sentences.zh: 乃轞車膠致，與王詣長安。

translations.literal: Then iron cart glue sent, with king to Chang'an.
translations.idiomatic: They were then sent in iron carts with glue applied, going with the king to Chang'an.

sentences.zh: 治張敖之罪。

translations.literal: Treated Zhang Ao crime.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Ao's crime was investigated.

sentences.zh: 上乃詔趙群臣賓客有敢從王皆族。

translations.literal: Emperor then decreed Zhao ministers guests have dare follow king all clan.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor then decreed that any Zhao ministers or guests who dared follow the king would all be executed along with their clans.

sentences.zh: 貫高與客孟舒等十餘人，皆自髡鉗，為王家奴，從來。

translations.literal: Guan Gao with guest Meng Shu etc. ten plus persons, all self shaved iron collar, as king family slave, followed come.
translations.idiomatic: Guan Gao and his guest Meng Shu and more than ten others all shaved their heads, wore iron collars, and disguised themselves as the king's family slaves to follow him.

sentences.zh: 貫高至，對獄，曰：「獨吾屬為之，王實不知。」

translations.literal: Guan Gao arrived, faced prison: 'Only my group did it, king really not know.'
translations.idiomatic: When Guan Gao arrived, facing the prison, he said: 'Only our group did this; the king truly knew nothing.'

sentences.zh: 吏治榜笞數千，刺剟，身無可擊者，終不復言。

translations.literal: Officials treated whipped several thousand, stabbed cut, body no could hit place, finally not again speak.
translations.idiomatic: The officials tortured him with thousands of beatings and stabbings. His body had no place left that could be struck, yet he never spoke again.

sentences.zh: 呂后數言張王以魯元公主故，不宜有此。

translations.literal: Lu Hou several times spoke Zhang Wang because Lu Yuan princess, not suitable have this.
translations.idiomatic: The Empress Lu repeatedly spoke about King Zhang because of Princess Lu Yuan, saying it was not fitting for this to happen.

sentences.zh: 上怒曰：「使張敖據天下，豈少而女乎！」

translations.literal: Emperor angered: 'Make Zhang Ao occupy world, how lack your daughter!'
translations.idiomatic: The emperor angrily said: 'If Zhang Ao were to occupy the world, would he lack for your daughter!'

sentences.zh: 不聽。

translations.literal: Not listened.
translations.idiomatic: He did not listen.

sentences.zh: 廷尉以貫高事辭聞，上曰：「壯士！

translations.literal: Court judge with Guan Gao matter words heard, emperor said: 'Strong man!
translations.idiomatic: The Court Judge reported the words of Guan Gao's matter. The emperor said: 'A stalwart man!'

sentences.zh: 誰知者，以私問之。」

translations.literal: Who know, with private ask.'
translations.idiomatic: Whoever knows, ask him privately.'

sentences.zh: 中大夫泄公曰：「臣之邑子，素知之。

translations.literal: Chamberlain Xie Gong said: 'Minister town child, originally know it.
translations.idiomatic: The Chamberlain Xie Gong said: 'My fellow townsman originally knew him.'

sentences.zh: 此固趙國立名義不侵為然諾者也。」

translations.literal: This indeed Zhao country establish name righteousness not encroach as promise yes.'
translations.idiomatic: This is indeed how Zhao established its reputation for righteousness and not encroaching on promises.'

sentences.zh: 上使泄公持節問之箯輿前。

translations.literal: Emperor made Xie Gong hold tally asked curtain carriage before.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor sent Xie Gong holding the tally to question him before the curtained carriage.

sentences.zh: 仰視曰：「泄公邪？」

translations.literal: Looked up said: 'Xie Gong?'
translations.idiomatic: He looked up and said: 'Is it Xie Gong?'

sentences.zh: 泄公勞苦如生平驩，與語，問張王果有計謀不。

translations.literal: Xie Gong labored comforted like lifetime happiness, with spoke, asked Zhang Wang indeed have plot not.
translations.idiomatic: Xie Gong comforted him with the same familiarity as in the old days. He spoke with him and asked if King Zhang indeed had a plot.

sentences.zh: 高曰：「人情寧不各愛其父母妻子乎？

translations.literal: Gao said: 'Person feeling rather not each love his parents wife children?
translations.idiomatic: Guan Gao said: 'Does human feeling not lead each person to love his parents, wife, and children?'

sentences.zh: 今吾三族皆以論死，豈以王易吾親哉！

translations.literal: Now my three clans all with adjudged die, how with king exchange my kin?
translations.idiomatic: Now my three clans have all been sentenced to death. Would I exchange the king for my own kin!'

sentences.zh: 顧為王實不反，獨吾等為之。」

translations.literal: Look for king really not rebel, only my etc. did it.'
translations.idiomatic: I only wish to clear the king of the charge of rebellion; only our group did this.'

sentences.zh: 具道本指所以為者王不知狀。

translations.literal: Detailed told original intention what for king not know condition.
translations.idiomatic: He fully explained the original intent and the circumstances of what was done without the king's knowledge.

sentences.zh: 於是泄公入，具以報，上乃赦趙王。

translations.literal: Then Xie Gong entered, detailed with reported, emperor then pardoned Zhao king.
translations.idiomatic: Xie Gong then entered and fully reported. The emperor pardoned the King of Zhao.

translations.literal: Han ninth year, Guan Gao resent family knew his plot, then presented change reported it. Ten plus persons all contended self cut throat, Guan Gao alone angered cursed: 'Who make you do it? Now king really no plot, yet together arrest king; You etc. all die, who clear king not rebel!' Then iron cart glue sent, with king to Chang'an. Treated Zhang Ao crime. Emperor then decreed Zhao ministers guests have dare follow king all clan. Guan Gao with guest Meng Shu etc. ten plus persons, all self shaved iron collar, as king family slave, followed come. Guan Gao arrived, faced prison: 'Only my group did it, king really not know.' Officials treated whipped several thousand, stabbed cut, body no could hit place, finally not again speak. Lu Hou several times spoke Zhang Wang because Lu Yuan princess, not suitable have this. Emperor angered: 'Make Zhang Ao occupy world, how lack your daughter!' Emperor angered: 'Make Zhang Ao occupy world, how lack your daughter!' Not listened. Court judge with Guan Gao matter words heard, emperor said: 'Strong man! Who know, with private ask.' This indeed Zhao country establish name righteousness not encroach as promise yes.' Emperor made Xie Gong hold tally asked curtain carriage before. Looked up said: 'Xie Gong?' Looked up said: 'Xie Gong?' Gao said: 'Person feeling rather not each love his parents wife children? Now my three clans all with adjudged die, how with king exchange my kin? Look for king really not rebel, only my etc. did it.' Detailed told original intention what for king not know condition. Then Xie Gong entered, detailed with reported, emperor then pardoned Zhao king. Emperor worthy Guan Gao person able establish promise yes, made Xie Gong detailed told him, said: 'Zhang Wang already out.'

sentences.zh: 上賢貫高為人能立然諾，使泄公具告之，曰：「張王已出。」

translations.literal: Emperor worthy Guan Gao person able establish promise yes, made Xie Gong detailed told him, said: 'Zhang Wang already out.'
translations.idiomatic: The emperor admired Guan Gao as a man who could establish promises. He had Xie Gong fully inform him: 'King Zhang has already been released.'

sentences.zh: 因赦貫高。

translations.literal: Because pardoned Guan Gao.
translations.idiomatic: He then pardoned Guan Gao.

sentences.zh: 貫高喜曰：「吾王審出乎？」

translations.literal: Guan Gao happy: 'My king indeed out?'
translations.idiomatic: Guan Gao happily said: 'Has my king truly been released?'

sentences.zh: 泄公曰：「然。」

translations.literal: Xie Gong said: 'Yes.'
translations.idiomatic: Xie Gong said: 'Yes.'

sentences.zh: 泄公曰：「上多足下，故赦足下。」

translations.literal: Xie Gong said: 'Emperor many your excellency, thus pardon your excellency.'
translations.idiomatic: Xie Gong said: 'The emperor esteems you highly, so he pardons you.'

sentences.zh: 貫高曰：「所以不死一身無餘者，白張王不反也。

translations.literal: Guan Gao said: 'What not die one body no remain, clear Zhang Wang not rebel.
translations.idiomatic: Guan Gao said: 'The reason I did not die and leave no remains was to clear King Zhang of the charge of rebellion.'

sentences.zh: 今王已出，吾責已塞，死不恨矣。

translations.literal: Now king already out, my duty already full, die not regret.
translations.idiomatic: Now that the king has been released, my duty is fulfilled. I have no regrets in death.'

sentences.zh: 且人臣有篡殺之名，何面目復事上哉！

translations.literal: Moreover person minister have usurp kill name, what face again serve above?
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, a minister has the name of plotting assassination. What face do I have to serve my superiors again!'

sentences.zh: 縱上不殺我，我不愧於心乎？」

translations.literal: Even above not kill me, I not ashamed heart?'
translations.idiomatic: Even if my superiors do not kill me, would I not be ashamed in my heart?'

sentences.zh: 乃仰絕骯，遂死。

translations.literal: Then looked up cut throat, thus died.
translations.idiomatic: He then looked up, cut his throat, and died.

sentences.zh: 當此之時，名聞天下。

translations.literal: When this time, name heard world.
translations.idiomatic: At this time, his reputation was heard throughout the world.

translations.literal: Emperor worthy Guan Gao person able establish promise yes, made Xie Gong detailed told him, said: 'Zhang Wang already out.' Guan Gao happy: 'My king indeed out?' Guan Gao happy: 'My king indeed out?' Xie Gong said: 'Emperor many your excellency, thus pardon your excellency.' Guan Gao said: 'What not die one body no remain, clear Zhang Wang not rebel. Now king already out, my duty already full, die not regret. Moreover person minister have usurp kill name, what face again serve above? Even above not kill me, I not ashamed heart?' Then looked up cut throat, thus died. When this time, name heard world. Zhang Ao already out, because still Lu Yuan princess, sealed as Xuanping hou.

sentences.zh: 張敖已出，以尚魯元公主故，封為宣平侯。

translations.literal: Zhang Ao already out, because still Lu Yuan princess, sealed as Xuanping hou.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Ao had already been released. Because he was married to Princess Lu Yuan, he was enfeoffed as Marquis of Xuanping.

sentences.zh: 於是上賢張王諸客，以鉗奴從張王入關，無不為諸侯相、郡守者。

translations.literal: Then emperor worthy Zhang Wang various guests, with iron collar slave followed Zhang Wang entered pass, none not as various lords chancellor, commandery guard.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor then honored King Zhang's various guests. Those who had worn iron collars as slaves and followed King Zhang into the pass all became chancellors of feudal lords or governors of commanderies.

sentences.zh: 及孝惠、高后、文帝、孝景時，張王客子孫皆得為二千石。

translations.literal: When filial Hui, Gao Hou, Wen Di, Xiao Jing time, Zhang Wang guests sons grandsons all got as two thousand shi.
translations.idiomatic: During the times of Emperors Hui, Empress Gao, Emperor Wen, and Emperor Jing, the sons and grandsons of King Zhang's guests all obtained positions of two thousand shi.

translations.literal: Then emperor worthy Zhang Wang various guests, with iron collar slave followed Zhang Wang entered pass, none not as various lords chancellor, commandery guard. When filial Hui, Gao Hou, Wen Di, Xiao Jing time, Zhang Wang guests sons grandsons all got as two thousand shi. When filial Hui, Gao Hou, Wen Di, Xiao Jing time, Zhang Wang guests sons grandsons all got as two thousand shi.

sentences.zh: 張敖，高后六年薨。

translations.literal: Zhang Ao, Gao Hou sixth year died.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang Ao died in the sixth year of Empress Gao.

sentences.zh: 子偃為魯元王。

translations.literal: Son Yan for Lu Yuan Wang.
translations.idiomatic: His son Yan became King of Lu Yuan.

sentences.zh: 以母呂后女故，呂后封為魯元王。

translations.literal: Because mother Lu Hou daughter, Lu Hou sealed as Lu Yuan Wang.
translations.idiomatic: Because his mother was Empress Lu's daughter, Empress Lu enfeoffed him as King of Lu Yuan.

sentences.zh: 元王弱，兄弟少，乃封張敖他姬子二人：壽為樂昌侯，侈為信都侯。

translations.literal: Yuan Wang weak, brothers few, then sealed Zhang Ao other consort sons two persons: Shou for Lechang hou, Chi for Xindu hou.
translations.idiomatic: The Yuan King was weak and had few brothers, so he enfeoffed two sons of Zhang Ao by other consorts: Shou as Marquis of Lechang, Chi as Marquis of Xindu.

sentences.zh: 高后崩，諸呂無道，大臣誅之，而廢魯元王及樂昌侯、信諸侯。

translations.literal: Gao Hou collapsed, various Lu no way, ministers executed them, yet abolished Lu Yuan Wang and Lechang hou, Xin hou.
translations.idiomatic: Empress Gao died. The various Lu acted without the Way. The ministers executed them and abolished the King of Lu Yuan and the Marquises of Lechang and Xin.

sentences.zh: 孝文帝即位，復封故魯元王偃為南宮侯，續張氏。

translations.literal: Filial Wen Di established, again sealed former Lu Yuan Wang Yan as Nan Gong hou, continued Zhang clan.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Wen ascended the throne and again enfeoffed the former King Yan of Lu Yuan as Marquis of Nangong, continuing the Zhang clan.

translations.literal: Son Yan for Lu Yuan Wang. Because mother Lu Hou daughter, Lu Hou sealed as Lu Yuan Wang. Yuan Wang weak, brothers few, then sealed Zhang Ao other consort sons two persons: Shou for Lechang hou, Chi for Xindu hou. Gao Hou collapsed, various Lu no way, ministers executed them, yet abolished Lu Yuan Wang and Lechang hou, Xin hou. Filial Wen Di established, again sealed former Lu Yuan Wang Yan as Nan Gong hou, continued Zhang clan. Grand Historian said: Zhang Er, Chen Yu, world tradition what called worthy;

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：張耳、陳餘，世傳所稱賢者；

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: Zhang Er, Chen Yu, world tradition what called worthy;
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: Zhang Er and Chen Yu were what the world traditionally called worthy men;

sentences.zh: 其賓客廝役，莫非天下俊桀，所居國無不取卿相者。

translations.literal: Their guests servants, none not world outstanding heroes, what dwelt country none not took minister chancellor.
translations.idiomatic: Their guests and servants were none other than the world's outstanding heroes. In whatever countries they dwelt, they all obtained positions as ministers and chancellors.

sentences.zh: 然張耳、陳餘始居約時，相然信以死，豈顧問哉。

translations.literal: However Zhang Er, Chen Yu beginning dwelt straitened, mutually yes trusted with death, how considered ask?
translations.idiomatic: However, when Zhang Er and Chen Yu first dwelt in straitened circumstances, they mutually trusted each other unto death—how could they have considered asking questions?

sentences.zh: 及據國爭權，卒相滅亡，何鄉者相慕用之誠，後相倍之戾也！

translations.literal: When occupied country contended power, finally mutually extinguished perished, what former mutually admired used sincerity, after mutually betrayed violent!
translations.idiomatic: When they occupied countries and contended for power, they finally extinguished each other. What of the sincerity they formerly admired and employed, that later turned to violent betrayal!

sentences.zh: 豈非以勢利交哉？

translations.literal: How not with power profit intercourse?
translations.idiomatic: Was this not friendship based on power and profit?

sentences.zh: 名譽雖高，賓客雖盛，所由殆與大伯、延陵季子異矣。

translations.literal: Name reputation though high, guests though flourishing, what by nearly with Tai Bo, Yanling Ji Zi different.
translations.idiomatic: Though their reputation was high and their guests flourishing, the path by which they arrived was quite different from that of Tai Bo and Yanling Jizi.
